'MacroName Hanzi2Pinyin
'MacroDescription:Automatically transliterate Chinese characters into Pinyin
'Macro written by: Thomas Ventimiglia, Princeton University East Asian Library 
' (Based on Korean2Latin by Joel Hahn, Niles Public Library District)
'Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License
' http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
'Dictionary based on three sources:
' - Unihan database: http://unicode.org/charts/unihan.html . Last updated 2023-07-15.
' - CC-CEDICT: http://www.mdbg.net/chinese/dictionary?page=cedict . Last Updated 2024-07-10.
' - User feedback: https://github.com/pulibrary/oclcpinyin/issues
'Macro Created: 5 January 2011
'Macro last modified: 10 July 2024
'Macro version: 2.1.3

Declare Function IsChineseChar(sNCR) As Integer

Declare Function TransliterateChinese9DA(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9DB(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9DC(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9DD(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9DE(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9DF(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9E0(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9E1(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9E2(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9E3(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9E4(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9E5(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9E6(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9E7(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9E8(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9E9(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9EA(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9EB(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9EC(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9ED(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9EE(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9EF(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9F0(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9F1(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9F2(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9F3(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9F4(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9F5(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9F6(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9F7(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9F8(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9F9(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9FA(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9FC(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9FD(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChinese9FE(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD840(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD841(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD842(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD843(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD844(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD845(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD846(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD847(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD848(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD849(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD84A(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD84B(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD84C(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD84D(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD84E(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD84F(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD850(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD851(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD852(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD853(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD854(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD855(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD856(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD857(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD858(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD859(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD85A(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD85B(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD85C(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD85D(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD85E(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD85F(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD860(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD861(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD862(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD863(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD864(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD865(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD866(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD867(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD868(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD869(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD86A(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD86B(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD86C(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD86D(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD86E(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD86F(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD870(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD871(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD872(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD873(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD874(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD875(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD876(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD877(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD878(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD879(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD87A(i As Integer) As String
Declare Function TransliterateChineseD87E(i As Integer) As String


Global arrChars()
Global arrNums()

Sub Main

   Dim CS As Object
   On Error Resume Next
   Set CS = GetObject( , "Connex.Client" )
   On Error GoTo 0
   If CS Is Nothing Then Set CS = CreateObject( "Connex.Client" )
   ReDim arrChars(0)

   bool = CS.GetFieldLineUnicode(CS.CursorRow, sField)
   If bool = FALSE Then
      MsgBox "Not viewing a MARC record. Exiting..."
      Exit Sub
   End If

   'Replace EOP character in indicator fields with period
   sField = ReplaceAll(sField, "&#x220E;",".")
   

   origField = sField

   'Pull the tag name and indicators
   NewField = Left(sField, 5)
   'The text of the field
   sField = Mid(sField, 6)
   
   'Make sure field contains Chinese text
   i = 1 : nHasChinese = 0
   Do While i <= Len(sField) - 7
     a = Mid(sField, i, 8)
     If IsChineseChar(Mid(sField, i, 6)) Then
       nHasChinese = 1
       Exit Do
     End If
     i = i + 1
   Loop
   If nHasChinese = 0 Then
      MsgBox "Field contains no Chinese characters. Exiting..."
      Exit Sub
   End If
   
   'Change wide spaces to normal spaces
   sField = ReplaceAll(sField, "&#x3000;", " ")
   'Convert dunhao comma
   sField = ReplaceAll(sField, "&#x3001;", ", ")
   'Convert CJK period
   sField = ReplaceAll(sField, "&#x3002;", ".")
   'Convert Middle Dot
   sField = ReplaceAll(sField, "&#x30FB;", " ")
   sField = ReplaceAll(sField, chr(168), " ")
   'Convert Long Dash
   sField = ReplaceAll(sField, "&#x30FC;", ":")
   sField = ReplaceAll(sField, "&#x2014;", ":")
   

   'Replace Fullwidth forms with halfwidth 
   place = 1
   If InStr(place, sField, "&#xFF") Then
      Do While InStr(place, sField, "&#xFF")
         place = InStr(place, sField, "&#xFF")
         code = Val("&H" & Mid(sField, place + 5, 2))
         If code > &H00 And code < &H5F Then
            sField = Mid(sField, 1, place-1) & "&#x00" & Hex(code + &H20) & ";" & Mid(sField, place+8)
         End If
      Loop
   End If

   'Load individual characters into an array.  Character entities, which 
   'are strings beginning with &#x, are treated as single characters.
   i = 1
   Do While i <= Len(sField)
      ReDim Preserve arrChars(UBound(arrChars) + 1)
      If Mid(sField, i, 3) = "&#x" Then
         place = InStr(i, sField, ";")
         sBCR = Mid(sField, i, (place - i) + 1)
         If InStr(2, sBCR, "&#x") Then
           k = 1
           Do While k <= Len(sBCR)
             If k > 1 Then ReDim Preserve arrChars(UBound(arrChars) + 1)
             place2 = InStr(k, sBCR, ";")
             sSingleBCR = Mid(sBCR, k, (place2 - k) + 1)
             arrChars(UBound(arrChars)) = sSingleBCR
             k = place2
             k = k + 1
           Loop
         Else
           arrChars(UBound(arrChars)) = sBCR
         End If
         i = place
      Else
         arrChars(UBound(arrChars)) = Mid(sField, i, 1)
      End If
      i = i + 1
   Loop


   'Transliterate any Chinese characters
   previ = 0
   i = 1  
   Do While i <= UBound(arrChars)
      inc = 1
      If InStr(arrChars(i), "&#x") Then
         nHex = GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
         Select Case nHex
           Case &H2F00& To &H9FFF&,&HD800& To &HDFFF&,&HF900& To &HFAFF& 
              TransliterateChinese(i)
              If Left(arrChars(i), 1) Like "[0-9]" Then
                 'Add an extra space if string does not end with entity
                 If Not(Right(arrChars(i),1) Like "[ ;]") Then
                    arrChars(i) = arrChars(i) & " "
                 End If
 'Add an extra space to previous character if it ends with
       'alphanumeric text or an end parenthesis or current character
       'start parenthesis.
                 If Right(arrChars(previ),1) Like "[0-9A-Za-z)]" Or _
                 Right(arrChars(previ),1) = "]" Or _
                 Left(arrChars(i),1) = "(" Or _
                 Left(arrChars(i),1) = "[" Then
                    arrChars(previ) = arrChars(previ) & " "
                 End If    
 
                 'The prefix is the result is the number of characters consumed
       'The result is all in arrChars(i), so the array entries for the
       'other consumed characters need to be blanked out.
       nLen = Val(Left(arrChars(i),1))
                 For j = i+1 To i+nLen-1
                   arrChars(j) = ""
                 Next j
                 arrChars(i) = Mid(arrChars(i),2)
                 inc = nLen
              End If
         End Select
      End If
     'Remove trailing space from previous character if current character does not begin with an alphanumeric or parenthesis
      If i > 0 And Len(arrChars(previ)) > 1 And _
         Right(arrChars(previ),1) = " " And _ 
         (Left(arrChars(i),1) Like "[!A-Za-z0-9(]" And Left(arrChars(i),1) <> "[") Then      
         arrChars(previ) = Left(arrChars(previ), Len(arrChars(previ)) - 1)
      End If
      previ = i
      i = i + inc      
   Loop
   
   'Handle numbers
   ReDim arrNums(UBound(arrChars))
   ConvertNumbers(Left(NewField,3))
   ParseNumbers
  
   'Create a single string out of array entries
   For i = 1 to UBound(arrChars)
      NewField = NewField & arrChars(i)
   Next i
   


   'Add a space after the umlaut character
   NewField = ReplaceAll(NewField, "&#x0308;", "&#x0308; ")
   NewField = Trim(ReplaceAll(" " & NewField & " ", " lue ", " lu&#x0308;e "))
   NewField = Trim(ReplaceAll(" " & NewField & " ", " nue ", " nu&#x0308;e "))
   'Remove double spaces
   NewField = Mid(NewField, 1, 5) & ReplaceAll(Mid(NewField,6), "  ", " ")

   
   'Capitalize first character of field (if not originally Latin text)
   
   i = 6
   i2 = 6
   Do Until ((Mid(NewField, i, 1) Like "[A-Za-z0-9]") Or i > Len(NewField))
     i = i + 1
     i2 = i2 + 1
   Loop
   If Mid(NewField, i, 1) Like "[a-z]" And Mid(origField, i2, 1) Like "[!a-z]" Then
      Mid(NewField, i, 1) = UCase(Mid(NewField, i, 1))
   End If

   'Capitalize first character of each subfield (if not originally Latin text)
   'Dont capitalize 245b if preceded by colon or 245h
   i = 6
   i2 = 6
   Do While InStr(i, NewField, "&#x01C2;")
     i = InStr(i, NewField, "&#x01C2;") + 9
     i2 = InStr(i2, origField, "&#x01C2;") + 9
     If Not(Left(NewField,3) = "245" And (Mid(NewField,i-1,1) = "h" Or (Mid(NewField,i-1,1) = "b" And (Mid(NewField,i-10,1) = ":" Or Mid(NewField,i-11,1) = ":")))) Then 
   Do Until ((Mid(NewField, i, 1) Like "[A-Za-z0-9]") Or i > Len(NewField))
     i = i + 1
     i2 = i2 + 1
   Loop
   If i <= Len(NewField) Then
      If (Mid(NewField, i, 1) Like "[a-z]" And Mid(origField,i2,1) Like "[!A-Za-z]") Then
         If Mid(NewField, i-1, 1) <> "#" Then 'part of numeric entity
       Mid(NewField, i, 1) = UCase(Mid(NewField, i, 1))
         Else
      i = i + 5
      i2 = i2 + 5
         End If
      End If
        End If
     End If
     i = i + 1
     i2 = i2 + 1
   Loop



  'Use proper name format for subfield r of any field
   i = 5
   i2 = 5
   Do While InStr(i, NewField, "&#x01C2;r")
     i = InStr(i, NewField, "&#x01C2;r") + 10
     i2 = InStr(i2, origField, "&#x01C2;r") + 10
     Do Until ((Mid(NewField, i, 1) Like "[A-Za-z]") Or i > Len(NewField))
        i = i + 1
   i2 = i2 + 1
     Loop
     If i <= Len(NewField) And Mid(origField, i2, 1) Like "[!A-Za-z]" Then
        j = InStr(i, NewField, " ")
        If Mid(NewField,j+1,1) Like "[A-Za-z]" Then
          Mid(NewField,j+1,1) = UCase(Mid(NewField,j+1,1))
          k = InStr(j+1, NewField, " ")
          If Mid(NewField,k+1,1) Like "[A-Za-z]" Then
        separator = ""
        If(Mid(NewField,k+1,1) Like "[aeo]") Then
           separator = chr(39)
        End If
             NewField = Mid(NewField,1,k-1) & separator & Mid(NewField, k+1)
          End If
        End If
     End If
     i = i + 1
   Loop

   'Use proper name format for subfield a of some other fields
   If Left(NewField, 4) Like "[1678]001" Then
       i = 5
       i2 = 5
       If InStr(i, NewField, "&#x01C2;a") Then
          i = InStr(i, NewField, "&#x01C2;a") + 9
     i2 = InStr(i2, origField, "&#x01C2;a") + 9
       End If
     Do Until ((Mid(NewField, i, 1) Like "[A-Za-z]") Or i > Len(NewField))
        i = i + 1
   i2 = i2 + 1
     Loop
     If i <= Len(NewField) And Mid(origField, i2, 1) Like "[!A-Za-z]" Then
        j = InStr(i, NewField, " ")
        If Mid(NewField,j+1,1) Like "[A-Za-z]" Then
          Mid(NewField,j+1,1) = UCase(Mid(NewField,j+1,1))
          NewField = Mid(NewField, 1, j-1) & "," & Mid(NewField, j)
          k = InStr(j+2, NewField, " ")
          If Mid(NewField,k+1,1) Like "[A-Za-z]" Then
             separator = ""
        If(Mid(NewField,k+1,1) Like "[aeo]") Then
           separator = chr(39)
        End If
             NewField = Mid(NewField,1,k-1) & separator & Mid(NewField, k+1)             
          End If
        End If
     End If
   End If

   'Change Angle Quotes to regular quotes
   inQuote = 0
   For i = 6 To Len(NewField) 
      extraSpace = ""
      quoteChar = chr(34)
      If(inQuote = 1) Then
         quoteChar = chr(39)
      End If
      
      If(Mid(NewField,i,1) = chr(34)) Then
         If(inQuote = 1) Then
            inQuote = 0
            If i < Len(NewField) And Mid(NewField,i+1,1) <> " " Then
               NewField = Left(NewField,i) & " " & Mid(NewField,i+1)
            End If
         Else
            inQuote = 1
         End If
      ElseIf(Mid(NewField,i,8) Like "&[#]x300[ACE];") Then     
         If(i > 6 And Mid(NewField,i-1,1) <> " ") Then
            extraSpace = " "
         End If
         If(Mid(NewField,i+8,1) Like "[a-z]") Then
            Mid(NewField,i+8,1) = UCase(Mid(NewField,i+8,1))
         End If
         NewField = Mid(NewField,1,i-1) & extraSpace & quoteChar & Mid(NewField,i+8)
         i = i + Len(extraSpace)
      ElseIf(Mid(NewField,i,8) Like "&[#]x300[BDF];") Then   
         If(i < Len(NewField)-8 And Mid(NewField,i+8,1) <> " ") Then
            extraSpace = " "
         End If
         NewField = Mid(NewField,1,i-1) & quoteChar & extraSpace & Mid(NewField, i+8)
         i = i + Len(extraSpace)
      End If   
   Next i

   'Converts a sequence of space-delimited single-digit numbers to a single number
   i = 6
   'temporarily pad with spaces to simplify logic
   NewField = Left(NewField,5) & " " & Mid(NewField,6) & " " 
   Do While(i <= Len(NewField))
      If Mid(NewField,i,5) Like " # # " Then
         NewField = Left(NewField, i+1) & Mid(NewField,i+3)
         Do While Mid(NewField,i+4,2) Like "# "
            NewField = Left(NewField,i+2) & Mid(NewField,i+4)
            i = i + 1
         Loop
      End If
      i = i + 1
   Loop
   NewField = Left(NewField,5) & Mid(NewField,7,Len(NewField)-7)


   'For fields 600 - 651, change second indicator from 4 to 0
   fieldNum = Val(Left(NewField,3))
   If(fieldNum >= 600 And fieldNum <= 651 And Mid(NewField,5,1) = "4") Then
      Mid(NewField,5,1) = "0"
   End If

   errors = ValidateField(NewField)
   If Len(errors) > 0 Then
      MsgBox(errors)
   End If
   
   'Restore EOP characters to tag and indicator fields
   i = 5
   Do While(i > 0)
      If(Mid(NewField,i,1) = ".") Then
         NewField = Left(NewField,i-1) & "&#x220E;" & Mid(NewField,i+1)
      End If
      i = i - 1
   Loop
   

   bool = CS.AddFieldLine(CS.CursorRow + 1, NewField)
   CS.CursorRow = CS.CursorRow -1
   CS.SendKeys "", -1
   CS.SendKeys "%(ekl)", -1

End Sub

'##############################################################################
'# ConvertNumbers: Determines which characters need to be converted to numbers 
'# and copies their numerical values to the 'arrNums' array


Function ConvertNumbers(sField As String)
   convertNField = 0
   inNField = 0
   ordinal = 0
   convert = 0
   sDateFormat = ""
   sYear = ""
   prevDigitPos = -2
   
   ReDim arrDate(UBound(arrChars)) As String
   flushDateArray = 0   
   
   'For these fields, convert any number in subfield 'n'
   If(sField = "245" or sField = "830") Then
      convertNField = 1
   End If
  
   For i = 0 to UBound(arrChars)
      sChr = arrChars(i)
      'Convert any number after the ordinal marker 
      If Left(sChr,3) Like "[Dd]i[#]" Then
         ordinal = 1
         arrChars(i) = Left(sChr,2) & Mid(sChr, 4)
      ElseIf Left(sChr,5) Like "[Nn]ian[#]" And InStr(1,sChr,"20") = 0  Then
         ordinal = 0
         arrChars(i) = Left(sChr,4) & Mid(sChr, 6)
         sDateFormat = sDateFormat & "Y"
         arrDate(i) = "Y"
      ElseIf Left(sChr,4) Like "[Yy]ue[#]" Then
         ordinal = 0
         arrChars(i) = Left(sChr,3) & Mid(sChr, 5)
         sDateFormat = sDateFormat & "M"
         arrDate(i) = "M"
      ElseIf Left(sChr,3) Like "[Rr]i[#]" Then
         ordinal = 0
         arrChars(i) = Left(sChr,2) & Mid(sChr, 4)
         sDateFormat = sDateFormat & "D"
         arrDate(i) = "D"
      ElseIf Left(sChr,4) Like "[Zz]hi[#]" Then
         arrChars(i) = Left(sChr, 3) & Mid(sChr, 5)
      ElseIf Left(sChr,3) Like "[Jj]i[#]" Then
         arrChars(i) = Left(sChr, 2) & Mid(sChr, 4)
      ElseIf Left(sChr,8) = "&#x01C2;" And i < UBound(arrChars) And convertNField = 1 Then
         numChars = 0
         If Left(arrChars(i+1),1) = "n" Then
            inNField = 1
         Else
            inNField = 0
         End If
      ElseIf sChr Like "[A-Za-z]*[#]#*" Then
         pos = InStr(1,sChr, "#")
         arrChars(i) = Mid(sChr,1,pos-1)
         If(Right(sChr,1) = " ") Then
            arrChars(i) = arrChars(i) & " "
         End If         
         sNum = Mid(sChr,pos+1)
         If(Right(sNum,1) = " ") Then
            sNum = Left(sNum,Len(sNum)-1)
         End If
         arrDate(i) = sNum
    'If there are 4 consecutive digits, treat them
    'as a 4-digit year and remove the spaces in between
         If Len(sNum) = 1 Then
            If prevDigitPos = i-1 Then
               sYear = sYear & sNum
               If Len(sYear) = 4 then
                  arrNums(i-3) = Mid(sYear,1,1) & " "
                  arrNums(i-2) = Mid(sYear,2,1) & " "
                  arrNums(i-1) = Mid(sYear,3,1) & " "
                  arrNums(i) = Mid(sYear,4,1)
                  If(Right(sChr,1) = " ") Then
                     arrNums(i) = arrNums(i) & " "
                  End If
                  sYear = ""
               End If
            Else
               sYear = sNum
            End If
            prevDigitPos = i
         End If

         If convert = 1 Then
            arrNums(i) = sNum
            arrDate(i) = ""
            If Right(sChr,1) = " " Then
               arrNums(i) = sNum & " "
            End If
         End if
      Else 
         flushDateArray = 1
         If(Left(sChr,1) Like "[A-Za-z]") Then
            ordinal = 0
         End If
      End If
      If i = UBound(arrNums) then
         flushDateArray = 1
      End If
               
      If ordinal Or inNField Then
         convert = 1
      Else
         convert = 0
      End If
            
      targetDate = ""
      dateSoFar = ""
      If flushDateArray Then
         If(InStr(1, sDateFormat, "YM") Or InStr(1, sDateFormat, "MD")) Then
            For j = 1 to i
              If targetDate = "" Then
                 If Len(sDateFormat) >= 4 And Left(sDateFormat, 4) = "YMDD" Then
                   targetDate = "YMDD"
                 ElseIf Len(sDateFormat) >= 3 And Left(sDateFormat, 3) = "YMD" Then
                   targetDate = "YMD"
                 ElseIf Len(sDateFormat) >= 3 And Left(sDateFormat, 3) = "YMM" Then
                   targetDate = "YMM"
                 ElseIf Len(sDateFormat) >= 2 And Left(sDateFormat, 2) = "YM" Then
                   targetDate = "YM"
                 ElseIf Len(sDateFormat) >= 3 And Left(sDateFormat, 3) = "MDD" Then
                   targetDate = "MDD"
                 ElseIf Len(sDateFormat) >= 2 And Left(sDateFormat, 2) = "MD" Then
                   targetDate = "MD"
                 End If
              End If
              If targetDate <> "" Then
                If Not(arrDate(j) Like "[YMD]") Then
                   If arrDate(j) <> "" Then
                     arrNums(j) = arrDate(j)
                   ElseIf arrNums(j-1) <> "" And arrNums(j-1) <> " " Then
                     arrNums(j-1) = arrNums(j-1) & " " 
                   End If
                Else
                   arrNums(j-1) = arrNums(j-1) & " "
                   dateSoFar = dateSoFar & arrDate(j)
                   sDateFormat = Mid(sDateFormat,2)
                End If
              ElseIf arrDate(j) Like "[YMD]" Then
                   sDateFormat = Mid(sDateFormat, 2)                
              End If
              arrDate(j) = ""
              If targetDate = "" Or targetDate = dateSoFar Then
                targetDate = ""
                dateSoFar = ""
              End If
           Next j 
         End If
         sDateFormat = ""  
         For j = 1 to i
           arrDate(j) = ""
         Next j
         flushDateArray = 0  
      End If     
   Next i
End Function

'##############################################################################
'# ParseNumbers: Go though the arrNums array and convert to numbers, copying 
'# the results back to arrChars 

Function ParseNumbers()
   numChars = 0
   places = 9
   'The number that has been calculated so far
   'Note: because the number may exceed the maximum integer size, 
   '  arrPlaces(8) must be checked separately in comparisons
   total = 0
   convertAndClear = 0

   'This array keeps track of the current number, by storing
   'a digit for the 1s, 10s, 100s, etc. place
   ReDim arrPlaces(places)

   'This first loop goes through arrNums and calculates the numbers represented,
   'keeping a running total in 'total', and keeping track of the value of each
   'place of the number in arrPlaces.  When the end of a number is reached, the
   'convertAndClear flag is set, and the number is copied to arrChars, and the 
   'other characters from arrNums that have been consumed are cleared.

   For i = 0 to UBound(arrNums)
      mod10 = total Mod 10
      mod100 = total Mod 100
      mod1000 = total Mod 1000
      mod10K = total Mod 10000
      
      sNum = arrNums(i)
      If Not(sNum = "") Then
         nNum = Val(sNum)
         If nNum < 10 Then 
            If total < 10  And arrPlaces(8) = 0 Then 
               numChars = 1
          arrPlaces(0) = nNum  
            ElseIf (total >= 10 Or arrPlaces(8) > 0) And mod10 = 0 Then
               numChars = numChars + 1
          arrPlaces(0) = nNum  
            ElseIf (total >= 10 Or arrPlaces(8) > 0) And mod10 > 0 Then
          convertAndClear = 1
            End If            
         ElseIf nNum = 10 Then
            If mod100 = 0 Then
               arrPlaces(1) = 1
               numChars = numChars + 1
            ElseIf mod100 > 0 And mod100 < 10 Then
               arrPlaces(1) = arrPlaces(0)
               arrPlaces(0) = 0
               numChars = numChars + 1
            ElseIf mod100 >= 10 Then
               convertAndClear = 1
            End If
         ElseIf nNum = 20 Then
            If mod100 = 0 Then
               arrPlaces(1) = 2
               arrPlaces(0) = 0
               numChars = numChars + 1
            Else
               convertAndClear = 1
            End If
         ElseIf nNum = 30 Then
            If mod100 = 0 Then
               arrPlaces(1) = 3
               arrPlaces(0) = 0
               numChars = numChars + 1
            Else
               convertAndClear = 1
            End If
         ElseIf nNum = 40 Then
            If mod100 = 0 Then
               arrPlaces(1) = 4
               arrPlaces(0) = 0
               numChars = numChars + 1
            Else
               convertAndClear = 1
            End If
         ElseIf nNum = 100 Then
            If mod1000 = 0 Then
               arrPlaces(2) = 1
               numChars = numChars + 1
            ElseIf mod1000 > 0 and mod1000 < 10 Then
               arrPlaces(2) = arrPlaces(0)
               arrPlaces(0) = 0
               numChars = numChars + 1
            ElseIf mod1000 >= 10 Then
          convertAndClear = 1
            End If
         ElseIf nNum = 1000 Then
            If mod10K = 0 Then
               arrPlaces(3) = 1
               numChars = numChars + 1
            ElseIf mod10K > 0 And mod10K < 10 Then
               arrPlaces(3) = arrPlaces(0)
               arrPlaces(0) = 0
               numChars = numChars + 1
            ElseIf mod10K >= 10 Then
          convertAndClear = 1
            End If
         ElseIf nNum = 10000 Then
            If total = 0 Then
               arrPlaces(4) = 1
               numChars = numChars + 1
            ElseIf total > 0 and arrPlaces(4) = 0 Then
               arrPlaces(4) = total
               For j = 0 To 3
                  arrPlaces(j) = 0
               Next j
               numChars = numChars + 1
            ElseIf arrPlaces(4) > 0 Then
          convertAndClear = 1
            End If
         ElseIf nNum = 100000000 Then
            If total = 0 Then
               arrPlaces(8) = 1
               numChars = numChars + 1
            ElseIf total > 0 and arrPlaces(8) = 0 Then
               arrPlaces(8) = total
          For j = 0 To 4
         arrPlaces(j) = 0
          Next j
               numChars = numChars + 1
            ElseIf arrPlaces(8) > 0 Then
          convertAndClear = 1
            End If            
         End If
       Else
         nNum = 0
         
         If numChars > 0 And total < 10 And arrPlaces(8) = 0 Then            
            numChars = 0
            ReDim arrPlaces(places)
         ElseIf total >= 10 Or arrPlaces(8) > 0 Then
            convertAndClear = 1
         End If
       End If 
       
       If (convertAndClear = 1) Then
          arrNums(i-numChars) = total
          If(Right(arrChars(i-1),1) = " ") Then
             arrNums(i-numChars) = total & " "
          End If
          For j = i-numChars+1 To i-1 
             arrNums(j) = "_"
          Next j    
          If arrPlaces(8) > 0 Then
            t = arrNums(i-numChars) + 100000000
            t = arrPlaces(8) & t
            tlen = Len(t)
            t = Left(t,tlen-9) & Right(t,8)
            arrNums(i-numChars) = t
          End If
          ReDim arrPlaces(places)
     If nNum < 10 Then
        arrPlaces(0) = nNum
     End If
     For j = 1 to 8
        If(nNum = 10^j) Then
      arrPlaces(j) = 1
        End If
          Next j
     If(sNum = "") Then
        numChars = 0
          Else
             numChars = 1
       End If
       convertAndClear = 0
     End If

       'Re-calculate total
       total = 0     
       For p = 0 to 7 
         total = total + arrPlaces(p)*(10^p)
       Next p  
   Next i
   
   'After exiting the loop, do one final calculation
   i = UBound(arrNums)
   If (total >= 10 Or arrPlaces(8) > 0) And arrNums(i) <> "" Then
      arrNums(i-numChars+1) = total
      If(Right(arrChars(i),1) = " ") Then
         arrNums(i-numChars+1) = total & " "
      End If
      For j = i-numChars+2 To i 
         arrNums(j) = "_"
      Next j
      If arrPlaces(8) > 0 Then
            t = arrNums(i-numChars+1) + 100000000
            t = arrPlaces(8) & t
            tlen = Len(t)
            t = Left(t,tlen-9) & Right(t,8)
            arrNums(i-numChars+1) = t
      End If
   End If
   
   'copy values over to arrChars
   For i = 0 to UBound(arrNums)
      If(arrNums(i) = "_") Then
         arrChars(i) = ""
      ElseIf(arrNums(i) <> "" And arrNums(i) <> " ") Then
         arrChars(i) = arrNums(i)
      End If    
   Next i 
End Function

'##############################################################################
'# ValidateField: Makes sure that all characters in the string are in the ANSEL
'# character set.  Returns a list of characters that are not

Function ValidateField(sStr As String) As String
   nLen = Len(sStr)
   sResult = ""
   pos = 1
   For i = 6 to nLen
      If Mid(sStr,i,8) Like "&[#]x[0-9A-F][0-9A-F][0-9A-F][0-9A-F];" Then
         sNum = Mid(sStr,i,8)
         nNum = GetHexCode(sNum)
         i = i + 7
      Else
         nNum = Asc(Mid(sStr,i,1))
         sNum = Val(nNum)        
      End If
      If Not((nNum > 0 And nNum < &H00FF&) Or nNum = &H0110& Or nNum = &H0111& Or nNum = &H0131& Or nNum = &H0141& Or nNum = &H0142& Or nNum = &H0152& Or nNum = &H0153& Or nNum = &H0300& Or nNum = &H0301& Or nNum = &H0302& Or nNum = &H0303& Or nNum = &H0304& Or nNum = &H0306& Or nNum = &H0307& Or nNum = &H0308& Or nNum = &H0309& Or nNum = &H0310& Or nNum = &H0313& Or nNum = &H0315& Or nNum = &H0323& Or nNum = &H0324& Or nNum = &H0325& Or nNum = &H0326& Or nNum = &H0327& Or nNum = &H0328& Or nNum = &H0332& Or nNum = &H0333& Or nNum = &H2113& Or nNum = &H2117& Or nNum = &H00A1& Or nNum = &H00A3& Or nNum = &H00A9& Or nNum = &H00AE& Or nNum = &H00B0& Or nNum = &H00B1& Or nNum = &H00B7& Or nNum = &H00BF& Or nNum = &H00C6& Or nNum = &H00D8& Or nNum = &H00DE& Or nNum = &H00DF& Or nNum = &H00F0& Or nNum = &H00F8& Or nNum = &H00FE& Or nNum = &H01A0& Or nNum = &H01A1& Or nNum = &H01AF& Or nNum = &H01B0& Or nNum = &H02B9& Or nNum = &H02BA& Or nNum = &H02BB& Or nNum = &H02BC& Or nNum = &H030A& Or nNum = &H030B& Or nNum = &H030C& Or nNum = &H031C& Or nNum = &H032E& Or nNum = &H266D& Or nNum = &H266F& Or nNum = &HFE20& Or nNum = &HFE21& Or nNum = &HFE22& Or nNum = &HFE23& Or nNum = &H01C2&) Then
         sResult = sResult & "Invalid character in result at position " & pos
         sResult = sResult & ": x" & Hex(nNum) & chr(10)
      End If
      pos = pos + 1
   Next i
   ValidateField = sResult
End Function

'##############################################################################
'# ReplaceAll: converts all instances of sFind to sReplace in sStr

Function ReplaceAll(sStr As String, sFind As String, sReplace As String) As String
   place = 1
   If InStr(place, sStr, sFind) Then
      Do While InStr(place, sStr, sFind)
          place = InStr(place, sStr, sFind)
          sStr = Left(sStr, place - 1) & sReplace & Mid(sStr, place + Len(sFind))
          place = place + Len(sReplace)
      Loop
   End If
   ReplaceAll = sStr
End Function

'##############################################################################
'# IsChineseChar: checks whether a character is a Chinese Character

Function IsChineseChar(sNCR) As Integer
   If Len(sNCR) = 6 And ((Mid(sNCR, 1, 5) Like "&[#]x3[4-9A-F]") Or (Mid(sNCR, 1, 4) Like "&[#]x[4-9]") Or (Mid(sNCR, 1, 5) Like "&[#]xF[9A]")) Then
      IsChineseChar = 1
   Else
      IsChineseChar = 0
   End If
End Function

'##############################################################################
'# GetHexCode: returns the hex code for a character

Function GetHexCode(sChar As String) as Long
   sHex = Mid(sChar, 4, 4)
   nHex = Val("&H" & sHex & "&")
   If nHex < 0 Then
      nHex = nHex + &HFFFF& + 1
   End If
   GetHexCode = nHex 
End Function


'##############################################################################
'# TransliterateChinese: main function for converting characters to pinyin.
'# Takes an index to arrChars.  Determines which sub-function to delegate to.
'# subfunctions may look ahead several characters in case the conversion
'# requires special formatting or non-standard pronunciation.  If more than 
'# one character is converted, the result is stored in arrChars(i) and any other 
'# characters that were consumed are blanked out.

Function TransliterateChinese(i As Integer) As String
    nHex = GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
    sHexFront = Mid(arrChars(i), 4, 2)
    nHexFront = Val("&H" & sHexFront)
    Select Case nHexFront
    Case &H00
	 TransliterateChinese00(i)
Case &H30
	 TransliterateChinese30(i)
Case &H31
	 TransliterateChinese31(i)
Case &H34
	 TransliterateChinese34(i)
Case &H35
	 TransliterateChinese35(i)
Case &H36
	 TransliterateChinese36(i)
Case &H37
	 TransliterateChinese37(i)
Case &H38
	 TransliterateChinese38(i)
Case &H39
	 TransliterateChinese39(i)
Case &H3A
	 TransliterateChinese3A(i)
Case &H3B
	 TransliterateChinese3B(i)
Case &H3C
	 TransliterateChinese3C(i)
Case &H3D
	 TransliterateChinese3D(i)
Case &H3E
	 TransliterateChinese3E(i)
Case &H3F
	 TransliterateChinese3F(i)
Case &H40
	 TransliterateChinese40(i)
Case &H41
	 TransliterateChinese41(i)
Case &H42
	 TransliterateChinese42(i)
Case &H43
	 TransliterateChinese43(i)
Case &H44
	 TransliterateChinese44(i)
Case &H45
	 TransliterateChinese45(i)
Case &H46
	 TransliterateChinese46(i)
Case &H47
	 TransliterateChinese47(i)
Case &H48
	 TransliterateChinese48(i)
Case &H49
	 TransliterateChinese49(i)
Case &H4A
	 TransliterateChinese4A(i)
Case &H4B
	 TransliterateChinese4B(i)
Case &H4C
	 TransliterateChinese4C(i)
Case &H4D
	 TransliterateChinese4D(i)
Case &H4E
	 TransliterateChinese4E(i)
Case &H4F
	 TransliterateChinese4F(i)
Case &H50
	 TransliterateChinese50(i)
Case &H51
	 TransliterateChinese51(i)
Case &H52
	 TransliterateChinese52(i)
Case &H53
	 TransliterateChinese53(i)
Case &H54
	 TransliterateChinese54(i)
Case &H55
	 TransliterateChinese55(i)
Case &H56
	 TransliterateChinese56(i)
Case &H57
	 TransliterateChinese57(i)
Case &H58
	 TransliterateChinese58(i)
Case &H59
	 TransliterateChinese59(i)
Case &H5A
	 TransliterateChinese5A(i)
Case &H5B
	 TransliterateChinese5B(i)
Case &H5C
	 TransliterateChinese5C(i)
Case &H5D
	 TransliterateChinese5D(i)
Case &H5E
	 TransliterateChinese5E(i)
Case &H5F
	 TransliterateChinese5F(i)
Case &H60
	 TransliterateChinese60(i)
Case &H61
	 TransliterateChinese61(i)
Case &H62
	 TransliterateChinese62(i)
Case &H63
	 TransliterateChinese63(i)
Case &H64
	 TransliterateChinese64(i)
Case &H65
	 TransliterateChinese65(i)
Case &H66
	 TransliterateChinese66(i)
Case &H67
	 TransliterateChinese67(i)
Case &H68
	 TransliterateChinese68(i)
Case &H69
	 TransliterateChinese69(i)
Case &H6A
	 TransliterateChinese6A(i)
Case &H6B
	 TransliterateChinese6B(i)
Case &H6C
	 TransliterateChinese6C(i)
Case &H6D
	 TransliterateChinese6D(i)
Case &H6E
	 TransliterateChinese6E(i)
Case &H6F
	 TransliterateChinese6F(i)
Case &H70
	 TransliterateChinese70(i)
Case &H71
	 TransliterateChinese71(i)
Case &H72
	 TransliterateChinese72(i)
Case &H73
	 TransliterateChinese73(i)
Case &H74
	 TransliterateChinese74(i)
Case &H75
	 TransliterateChinese75(i)
Case &H76
	 TransliterateChinese76(i)
Case &H77
	 TransliterateChinese77(i)
Case &H78
	 TransliterateChinese78(i)
Case &H79
	 TransliterateChinese79(i)
Case &H7A
	 TransliterateChinese7A(i)
Case &H7B
	 TransliterateChinese7B(i)
Case &H7C
	 TransliterateChinese7C(i)
Case &H7D
	 TransliterateChinese7D(i)
Case &H7E
	 TransliterateChinese7E(i)
Case &H7F
	 TransliterateChinese7F(i)
Case &H80
	 TransliterateChinese80(i)
Case &H81
	 TransliterateChinese81(i)
Case &H82
	 TransliterateChinese82(i)
Case &H83
	 TransliterateChinese83(i)
Case &H84
	 TransliterateChinese84(i)
Case &H85
	 TransliterateChinese85(i)
Case &H86
	 TransliterateChinese86(i)
Case &H87
	 TransliterateChinese87(i)
Case &H88
	 TransliterateChinese88(i)
Case &H89
	 TransliterateChinese89(i)
Case &H8A
	 TransliterateChinese8A(i)
Case &H8B
	 TransliterateChinese8B(i)
Case &H8C
	 TransliterateChinese8C(i)
Case &H8D
	 TransliterateChinese8D(i)
Case &H8E
	 TransliterateChinese8E(i)
Case &H8F
	 TransliterateChinese8F(i)
Case &H90
	 TransliterateChinese90(i)
Case &H91
	 TransliterateChinese91(i)
Case &H92
	 TransliterateChinese92(i)
Case &H93
	 TransliterateChinese93(i)
Case &H94
	 TransliterateChinese94(i)
Case &H95
	 TransliterateChinese95(i)
Case &H96
	 TransliterateChinese96(i)
Case &H97
	 TransliterateChinese97(i)
Case &H98
	 TransliterateChinese98(i)
Case &H99
	 TransliterateChinese99(i)
Case &H9A
	 TransliterateChinese9A(i)
Case &H9B
	 TransliterateChinese9B(i)
Case &H9C
	 TransliterateChinese9C(i)
Case &H9D
	 TransliterateChinese9D(i)
Case &H9E
	 TransliterateChinese9E(i)
Case &H9F
	 TransliterateChinese9F(i)
Case &HD8
	 TransliterateChineseD8(i)

    End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese00(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H0060& To &H006F&
	TransliterateChinese006(i)
Case &H0070& To &H007F&
	TransliterateChinese007(i)
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese30(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H3000& To &H300F&
	TransliterateChinese300(i)
Case &H3020& To &H302F&
	TransliterateChinese302(i)
Case &H3030& To &H303F&
	TransliterateChinese303(i)
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese31(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H3100& To &H310F&
	TransliterateChinese310(i)
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese34(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H3400& To &H340F&
	TransliterateChinese340(i)
Case &H3410& To &H341F&
	TransliterateChinese341(i)
Case &H3420& To &H342F&
	TransliterateChinese342(i)
Case &H3430& To &H343F&
	TransliterateChinese343(i)
Case &H3440& To &H344F&
	TransliterateChinese344(i)
Case &H3450& To &H345F&
	TransliterateChinese345(i)
Case &H3460& To &H346F&
	TransliterateChinese346(i)
Case &H3470& To &H347F&
	TransliterateChinese347(i)
Case &H3480& To &H348F&
	TransliterateChinese348(i)
Case &H3490& To &H349F&
	TransliterateChinese349(i)
Case &H34A0& To &H34AF&
	TransliterateChinese34A(i)
Case &H34B0& To &H34BF&
	TransliterateChinese34B(i)
Case &H34C0& To &H34CF&
	TransliterateChinese34C(i)
Case &H34D0& To &H34DF&
	TransliterateChinese34D(i)
Case &H34E0& To &H34EF&
	TransliterateChinese34E(i)
Case &H34F0& To &H34FF&
	TransliterateChinese34F(i)
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese35(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H3500& To &H350F&
	TransliterateChinese350(i)
Case &H3510& To &H351F&
	TransliterateChinese351(i)
Case &H3520& To &H352F&
	TransliterateChinese352(i)
Case &H3530& To &H353F&
	TransliterateChinese353(i)
Case &H3540& To &H354F&
	TransliterateChinese354(i)
Case &H3550& To &H355F&
	TransliterateChinese355(i)
Case &H3560& To &H356F&
	TransliterateChinese356(i)
Case &H3570& To &H357F&
	TransliterateChinese357(i)
Case &H3580& To &H358F&
	TransliterateChinese358(i)
Case &H3590& To &H359F&
	TransliterateChinese359(i)
Case &H35A0& To &H35AF&
	TransliterateChinese35A(i)
Case &H35B0& To &H35BF&
	TransliterateChinese35B(i)
Case &H35C0& To &H35CF&
	TransliterateChinese35C(i)
Case &H35D0& To &H35DF&
	TransliterateChinese35D(i)
Case &H35E0& To &H35EF&
	TransliterateChinese35E(i)
Case &H35F0& To &H35FF&
	TransliterateChinese35F(i)
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese36(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H3600& To &H360F&
	TransliterateChinese360(i)
Case &H3610& To &H361F&
	TransliterateChinese361(i)
Case &H3620& To &H362F&
	TransliterateChinese362(i)
Case &H3630& To &H363F&
	TransliterateChinese363(i)
Case &H3640& To &H364F&
	TransliterateChinese364(i)
Case &H3650& To &H365F&
	TransliterateChinese365(i)
Case &H3660& To &H366F&
	TransliterateChinese366(i)
Case &H3670& To &H367F&
	TransliterateChinese367(i)
Case &H3680& To &H368F&
	TransliterateChinese368(i)
Case &H3690& To &H369F&
	TransliterateChinese369(i)
Case &H36A0& To &H36AF&
	TransliterateChinese36A(i)
Case &H36B0& To &H36BF&
	TransliterateChinese36B(i)
Case &H36C0& To &H36CF&
	TransliterateChinese36C(i)
Case &H36D0& To &H36DF&
	TransliterateChinese36D(i)
Case &H36E0& To &H36EF&
	TransliterateChinese36E(i)
Case &H36F0& To &H36FF&
	TransliterateChinese36F(i)
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese37(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H3700& To &H370F&
	TransliterateChinese370(i)
Case &H3710& To &H371F&
	TransliterateChinese371(i)
Case &H3720& To &H372F&
	TransliterateChinese372(i)
Case &H3730& To &H373F&
	TransliterateChinese373(i)
Case &H3740& To &H374F&
	TransliterateChinese374(i)
Case &H3750& To &H375F&
	TransliterateChinese375(i)
Case &H3760& To &H376F&
	TransliterateChinese376(i)
Case &H3770& To &H377F&
	TransliterateChinese377(i)
Case &H3780& To &H378F&
	TransliterateChinese378(i)
Case &H3790& To &H379F&
	TransliterateChinese379(i)
Case &H37A0& To &H37AF&
	TransliterateChinese37A(i)
Case &H37B0& To &H37BF&
	TransliterateChinese37B(i)
Case &H37C0& To &H37CF&
	TransliterateChinese37C(i)
Case &H37D0& To &H37DF&
	TransliterateChinese37D(i)
Case &H37E0& To &H37EF&
	TransliterateChinese37E(i)
Case &H37F0& To &H37FF&
	TransliterateChinese37F(i)
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese38(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H3800& To &H380F&
	TransliterateChinese380(i)
Case &H3810& To &H381F&
	TransliterateChinese381(i)
Case &H3820& To &H382F&
	TransliterateChinese382(i)
Case &H3830& To &H383F&
	TransliterateChinese383(i)
Case &H3840& To &H384F&
	TransliterateChinese384(i)
Case &H3850& To &H385F&
	TransliterateChinese385(i)
Case &H3860& To &H386F&
	TransliterateChinese386(i)
Case &H3870& To &H387F&
	TransliterateChinese387(i)
Case &H3880& To &H388F&
	TransliterateChinese388(i)
Case &H3890& To &H389F&
	TransliterateChinese389(i)
Case &H38A0& To &H38AF&
	TransliterateChinese38A(i)
Case &H38B0& To &H38BF&
	TransliterateChinese38B(i)
Case &H38C0& To &H38CF&
	TransliterateChinese38C(i)
Case &H38D0& To &H38DF&
	TransliterateChinese38D(i)
Case &H38E0& To &H38EF&
	TransliterateChinese38E(i)
Case &H38F0& To &H38FF&
	TransliterateChinese38F(i)
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese39(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H3900& To &H390F&
	TransliterateChinese390(i)
Case &H3910& To &H391F&
	TransliterateChinese391(i)
Case &H3920& To &H392F&

Case &H5C00& To &H5C0F&
	TransliterateChinese5C0(i)
Case &H5C10& To &H5C1F&
	TransliterateChinese5C1(i)
Case &H5C20& To &H5C2F&
	TransliterateChinese5C2(i)

	TransliterateChinese5C3(i)

	TransliterateChinese5C4(i)

	TransliterateChinese5C5(i)
Case &H5C60& To &H5C6F&
	TransliterateChinese5C6(i)
Case &H5C70& To &H5C7F&
	TransliterateChinese5C7(i)
Case &H5C80& To &H5C8F&
	TransliterateChinese5C8(i)
Case &H5C90& To &H5C9F&
	TransliterateChinese5C9(i)
Case &H5CA0& To &H5CAF&
	TransliterateChinese5CA(i)
Case &H5CB0& To &H5CBF&
	TransliterateChinese5CB(i)
Case &H5CC0& To &H5CCF&
	TransliterateChinese5CC(i)
Case &H5CD0& To &H5CDF&
	TransliterateChinese5CD(i)
Case &H5CE0& To &H5CEF&
	TransliterateChinese5CE(i)
Case &H5CF0& To &H5CFF&
	TransliterateChinese5CF(i)
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese006(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H0062&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H683C&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi ge"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H0065&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4EBA&
		arrChars(i) = "2e - ren"
	Case &H4ED4&
		arrChars(i) = "2e zai"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H0069&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4EBA&
		arrChars(i) = "2i - ren"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H006B&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4ED4&
		arrChars(i) = "2k zai"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese007(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H0071&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5F39&
		arrChars(i) = "2q tan"
	Case &H5F48&
		arrChars(i) = "2q tan"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese4E0(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H4E00&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi#1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5319&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi chi"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E01&
	arrChars(i) = "1ding"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E01&
		arrChars(i) = "2zheng zheng"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E02&
	arrChars(i) = "1kao"
Case &H4E03&
	arrChars(i) = "1qi#7"
Case &H4E04&
	arrChars(i) = "1shang"
Case &H4E05&
	arrChars(i) = "1xia"
Case &H4E06&
	arrChars(i) = "1han"
Case &H4E07&
	arrChars(i) = "1wan#10000"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4FDF&
		arrChars(i) = "2mo qi"
	Case &H90A3&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H675C&
			arrChars(i) = "3Wannadu"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E08&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhang"
Case &H4E09&
	arrChars(i) = "1san#3"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H53F0&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Santai Xian"
		Case &H7E23&
			arrChars(i) = "3Santai Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H85CF&
		arrChars(i) = "2san zang"
	Case &H91CD&
		arrChars(i) = "2san chong"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E0A&
	arrChars(i) = "1shang"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5408&
		arrChars(i) = "2shang - he"
	Case &H57CE&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H533A&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shangcheng Qu"
		Case &H5340&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shangcheng Qu"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5B98&
		arrChars(i) = "2Shangguan"
	Case &H6D77&
		arrChars(i) = "2Shanghai"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5730&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H533A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Shanghai Diqu"
			Case &H5340&
				arrChars(i) = "4Shanghai Diqu"
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shanghai Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H8272&
		arrChars(i) = "2shang shai"
	Case &H8ABF&
		arrChars(i) = "2shang tiao"
	Case &H8C03&
		arrChars(i) = "2shang tiao"
	Case &H988C&
		arrChars(i) = "2shang he"
	Case &H9952&
		arrChars(i) = "2Shangrao"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shangrao Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9976&
		arrChars(i) = "2Shangrao"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shangrao Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E0B&
	arrChars(i) = "1xia"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8ABF&
		arrChars(i) = "2xia tiao"
	Case &H8C03&
		arrChars(i) = "2xia tiao"
	Case &H9826&
		arrChars(i) = "2xia ke"
	Case &H988C&
		arrChars(i) = "2xia he"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E0C&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
Case &H4E0D&
	arrChars(i) = "1bu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E39&
		arrChars(i) = "2Budan"
	Case &H4E86&
		arrChars(i) = "2bu le"
	Case &H5331&
		arrChars(i) = "2bu kui"
	Case &H5E72&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H8FBE&
			arrChars(i) = "3Buganda"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5E79&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H9054&
			arrChars(i) = "3Buganda"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7740&
		arrChars(i) = "2bu zhao"
	Case &H8457&
		arrChars(i) = "2bu zhao"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E0E&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H4E0F&
	arrChars(i) = "1mian"
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese4E1(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H4E10&
	arrChars(i) = "1gai"
Case &H4E11&
	arrChars(i) = "1chou"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H89D2&
		arrChars(i) = "2chou jue"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E12&
	arrChars(i) = "1chou"
Case &H4E13&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhuan"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H957F&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhuan chang"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E14&
	arrChars(i) = "1qie"
Case &H4E15&
	arrChars(i) = "1pi"
Case &H4E16&
	arrChars(i) = "1shi"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then

	Case &H884C&

	Case &H9280&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi - yin"
	Case &H94F6&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi - yin"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E17&
	arrChars(i) = "1shi"
Case &H4E18&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiu"
Case &H4E19&
	arrChars(i) = "1bing"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H620C&
		arrChars(i) = "2bing xu"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E1A&
	arrChars(i) = "1ye"
Case &H4E1B&
	arrChars(i) = "1cong"
Case &H4E1C&
	arrChars(i) = "1dong"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4EAC&
		arrChars(i) = "2Dongjing"

Function TransliterateChinese4E2(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H4E20&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiu"
Case &H4E21&
	arrChars(i) = "1liang"
Case &H4E22&
	arrChars(i) = "1diu"
Case &H4E23&
	arrChars(i) = "1you"
Case &H4E24&
	arrChars(i) = "1liang#2"
Case &H4E25&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H4E26&
	arrChars(i) = "1bing"
Case &H4E27&
	arrChars(i) = "1sang"
Case &H4E28&
	arrChars(i) = "1gun"
Case &H4E29&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiu"
Case &H4E2A&
	arrChars(i) = "1ge"
Case &H4E2B&
	arrChars(i) = "1ya"
Case &H4E2C&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiang"
Case &H4E2D&
	arrChars(i) = "1华人民共和国"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H534E&
		arrChars(i) = "2Zhonghua"
	Case &H56FD&
		arrChars(i) = "2Zhongguo"
	Case &H570B&
		arrChars(i) = "2Zhongguo"
	Case &H57D4&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhong pu"
	Case &H5C71&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H533A&
			arrChars(i) = "3Zhongshang Qu"
		Case &H5340&
			arrChars(i) = "3Zhongshang Qu"
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Zhongshan Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H610F&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhong - yi"
	Case &H65F6&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhong - shi"
	Case &H6642&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhong - shi"
	Case &H6B27&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhong - ou"
	Case &H6B50&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhong - ou"
	Case &H725F&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhong mu"
	Case &H7684&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhong de"
	Case &H83EF&
		arrChars(i) = "2Zhonghua"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4EBA&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H6C11&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5171&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H548C&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H570B&
							arrChars(i) = "7Zhonghua Renmin Gongheguo"
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H884C&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhong hang"
	Case &H9014&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C9B&
			arrChars(i) = "3Zhongtudao"
		Case &H5CF6&
			arrChars(i) = "3Zhongtudao"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H975E&
		arrChars(i) = "2Zhongfei"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E2E&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
Case &H4E2F&
	arrChars(i) = "1jie"
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese4E3(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H4E30&
	arrChars(i) = "1feng"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H53F0&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H533A&
			arrChars(i) = "3Fengtai Qu"
		Case &H5340&
			arrChars(i) = "3Fengtai Qu"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E31&
	arrChars(i) = "1guan"
Case &H4E32&
	arrChars(i) = "1chuan"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H884C&
		arrChars(i) = "2chuan hang"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E33&
	arrChars(i) = "1chan"
Case &H4E34&
	arrChars(i) = "1lin"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H590F&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Linxia Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6710&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Linqu Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6C7E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Linfen Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6C82&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5730&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H533A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Linyi Diqu"
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Linyi Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6CAD&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Linshu Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6D77&

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Linhai Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6FA7&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Linli Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9091&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Linyi Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E35&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhuo"
Case &H4E36&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhu"
Case &H4E37&
	arrChars(i) = "1ba"
Case &H4E38&
	arrChars(i) = "1wan"
Case &H4E39&
	arrChars(i) = "1dan"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H53C2&
		arrChars(i) = "2dan shen"
	Case &H53C3&
		arrChars(i) = "2dan shen"
	Case &H9EA5&
		arrChars(i) = "2Danmai"
	Case &H9EA6&
		arrChars(i) = "2Danmai"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E3A&

	arrChars(i) = "1yi"

	Case &H4EC0&

	Case &H5179&

			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H514B&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H65AF&

					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H5766&
						arrChars(i) = "6Wuzibiekesitan"
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H62C9&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then

			arrChars(i) = "3Wulagui"
		End Select

			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H9F50&
				arrChars(i) = "4Wulumuqi"
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5E02&
					arrChars(i) = "5Wulumuqi Shi"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4E4D&
	arrChars(i) = "1zha"
Case &H4E4E&
	arrChars(i) = "1hu"
Case &H4E4F&
	arrChars(i) = "1fa"
End Select

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))

	Case &H6D32&
		arrChars(i) = "2Ya Zhou"

			End Select

Case &H4E9D&
	arrChars(i) = "1qi"

Case &H4FF1&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
Case &H4FF2&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiao"

	arrChars(i) = "1pai"

	Case &H4F6A&
		arrChars(i) = "2pai huai"
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1jian"

Case &H4FF6&
	arrChars(i) = "1chu"

	arrChars(i) = "1fei"

	Case &H7D66&
		arrChars(i) = "2feng ji"
	Case &H7ED9&
		arrChars(i) = "2feng ji"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H4FF9&
	arrChars(i) = "1ya"

	arrChars(i) = "1an"

Function TransliterateChinese510(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5100&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi"
Case &H5101&
	arrChars(i) = "1jun"
Case &H5102&
	arrChars(i) = "1nong"
Case &H5103&
	arrChars(i) = "1chan"
Case &H5104&

	Case &H52D2&
		arrChars(i) = "2ke le"

		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then

				Case &H4E9A&

				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select

					arrChars(i) = "5Keluo'eixiya"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If

		arrChars(i) = "2ru hang"
	End Select

Case &H5166&

					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If

		arrChars(i) = "2nei hang"
	End Select
	End If

Function TransliterateChinese51B(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H51B0&
	arrChars(i) = "1bing"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5C9B&
		arrChars(i) = "2Bingdao"
	Case &H5CF6&
		arrChars(i) = "2Bingdao"
	Case &H722A&
		arrChars(i) = "2bing zhua"
	Case &H93AC&
		arrChars(i) = "2bing gao"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H51B1&
	arrChars(i) = "1hu"
Case &H51B2&
	arrChars(i) = "1chong"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8C03&
		arrChars(i) = "2chong tiao"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H51B3&
	arrChars(i) = "1jue"

			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&

				Case &H767B&
					arrChars(i) = "5Liezhidunsideng"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1liu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7985&
		arrChars(i) = "2liu shan"
	End Select

Function TransliterateChinese52A(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H52A0&
	arrChars(i) = "1jia"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5229&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H798F&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5C3C&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H4E9A&
					arrChars(i) = "5Jialifuniya"
				Case &H4E9E&
					arrChars(i) = "5Jialifuniya"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5DDE&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jia Zhou"

		arrChars(i) = "2Jiapeng"
	Case &H62FF&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5927&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jianada"
		End Select
		End If

			End If
		End Select

	Case &H7E46&
		arrChars(i) = "2jia miu"
	Case &H7EF4&

			End Select

		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7F2A&

	Case &H8428&

			End Select

	Case &H957F&

	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1shou"
Case &H53CF&
	arrChars(i) = "1guai"
End Select
End Function

	Case &H6A21&
		arrChars(i) = "2qu mu"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H53D7&
	arrChars(i) = "1shou"

	Case &H7985&
		arrChars(i) = "2shou shan"
	Case &H79AA&

		arrChars(i) = "2jiao xiao"
	End Select

	Case &H8ABF&
		arrChars(i) = "2ke tiao"
	Case &H8C03&

Function TransliterateChinese540(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5400&
	arrChars(i) = "1mie"
Case &H5401&
	arrChars(i) = "1xu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8BF7&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu qing"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5402&
	arrChars(i) = "1mang"
Case &H5403&
	arrChars(i) = "1chi"
Case &H5404&
	arrChars(i) = "1ge"
Case &H5405&

Case &H5406&

Case &H5407&
	arrChars(i) = "1zi"
Case &H5408&
	arrChars(i) = "1he"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5DDD&

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H533A&
			arrChars(i) = "3Hechuan Qu"
		Case &H5340&
			arrChars(i) = "3Hechuan Qu"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7740&
		arrChars(i) = "2he zhe"
	Case &H80A5&
		arrChars(i) = "2Hefei"

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Hefei Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H8457&
		arrChars(i) = "2he zhe"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5409&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H52D2&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji le"
	Case &H5C14&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5409&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5766&
					arrChars(i) = "5Jierjisitan"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5E03&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5730&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jibudi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6797&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jilin"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7701&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jilin Sheng"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H723E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5409&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5766&
					arrChars(i) = "5Jierjisitan"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H88CF&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5DF4&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&
				arrChars(i) = "4Jilibasi"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H91CC&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5DF4&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&
				arrChars(i) = "4Jilibasi"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H540A&
	arrChars(i) = "1diao"
Case &H540B&
	arrChars(i) = "1cun"
Case &H540C&
	arrChars(i) = "1tong"

	End Select
	End If
Case &H540E&
	arrChars(i) = "1hou"

					arrChars(i) = "5Gesidalijia"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select

				Case &H52A0&
					arrChars(i) = "5Gesidalijia"
				End Select

			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1o"

	arrChars(i) = "1chi"

Case &H5603&
	arrChars(i) = "1chong"
Case &H5604&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiao"

	arrChars(i) = "1kai"

	arrChars(i) = "1shan"
Case &H5608&
	arrChars(i) = "1cao"
Case &H5609&
	arrChars(i) = "1jia"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E49&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jiayi"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jiayi Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5174&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jiaxing Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5584&

		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jiashan Xian"
		Case &H7E23&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jiashan Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6176&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jiaqing"
	Case &H7FA9&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jiayi"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jiayi Shi"
		End Select
		End If

			arrChars(i) = "3Jiaxing Shi"
		End Select
		End If

	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1ai"

	arrChars(i) = "1xiao"

	arrChars(i) = "1si#4"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5DDD&
		arrChars(i) = "2Sichuan"

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7701&
			arrChars(i) = "3Sichuan Sheng"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If

	End Select

End Select

Function TransliterateChinese572(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5720&
	arrChars(i) = "1ya"
Case &H5721&
	arrChars(i) = "1tu"
Case &H5722&
	arrChars(i) = "1ting"
Case &H5723&
	arrChars(i) = "1sheng"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E50&
		arrChars(i) = "2sheng yue"
	Case &H591A&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7F8E&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shengduomei"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6587&

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H68EE&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shengwensen"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H8BDE&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C9B&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shengdandao"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9732&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H897F&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Shengluxiya"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9A6C&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H529B&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H8BFA&
				arrChars(i) = "4Shengmalinuo"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5724&
	arrChars(i) = "1pu"
Case &H5725&
	arrChars(i) = "1lu"
Case &H5726&
	arrChars(i) = "1kuai"
Case &H5727&
	arrChars(i) = "1ya"
Case &H5728&
	arrChars(i) = "1zai"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H884C&
		arrChars(i) = "2zai hang"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5729&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
Case &H572A&
	arrChars(i) = "1ge"
Case &H572B&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H572C&

Case &H572E&

	Case &H53CA&
		arrChars(i) = "2Aiji"
	Case &H585E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4FC4&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H6BD4&

				Case &H4E9A&
					arrChars(i) = "5Aisai'ebiya"
				Case &H4E9E&
					arrChars(i) = "5Aisai'ebiya"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H57C4&
	arrChars(i) = "1beng"
Case &H57C5&
	arrChars(i) = "1fang"
Case &H57C6&
	arrChars(i) = "1que"

	arrChars(i) = "1yong"

	End If
Case &H57FA&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7763&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jidu"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5F92&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jidutu"
		Case &H6559&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jidu jiao"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9686&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jilong"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jilong Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H57FB&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhun"
Case &H57FC&
	arrChars(i) = "1qi"
Case &H57FD&
	arrChars(i) = "1sao"
Case &H57FE&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
Case &H57FF&
	arrChars(i) = "1ni"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese59D(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H59D0&
	arrChars(i) = "1jie"
Case &H59D1&
	arrChars(i) = "1gu"
Case &H59D2&
	arrChars(i) = "1si"
Case &H59D3&
	arrChars(i) = "1xing"
Case &H59D4&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5167&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H745E&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H62C9&
				arrChars(i) = "4Weineiruila"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5185&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H745E&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H62C9&
				arrChars(i) = "4Weineiruila"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H59D5&
	arrChars(i) = "1zi"
Case &H59D6&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
Case &H59D7&
	arrChars(i) = "1shan"
Case &H59D8&
	arrChars(i) = "1pin"
Case &H59D9&
	arrChars(i) = "1ren"
Case &H59DA&
	arrChars(i) = "1yao"
Case &H59DB&
	arrChars(i) = "1dong"
Case &H59DC&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiang"
Case &H59DD&
	arrChars(i) = "1shu"
Case &H59DE&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
Case &H59DF&
	arrChars(i) = "1gai"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese5A0(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5A00&
	arrChars(i) = "1song"
Case &H5A01&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H535C&
		arrChars(i) = "2wei bu"
	Case &H5413&
		arrChars(i) = "2wei he"
	Case &H5687&
		arrChars(i) = "2wei he"
	Case &H5C3C&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H65AF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Weinisi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7FDF&
		arrChars(i) = "2wei zhai"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5A02&
	arrChars(i) = "1hong"
Case &H5A03&
	arrChars(i) = "1wa"
Case &H5A04&
	arrChars(i) = "1lou"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5BBF&
		arrChars(i) = "2lou xiu"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5A05&
	arrChars(i) = "1ya"
Case &H5A06&
	arrChars(i) = "1rao"
Case &H5A07&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiao"
Case &H5A08&
	arrChars(i) = "1luan"
Case &H5A09&
	arrChars(i) = "1ping"
Case &H5A0A&
	arrChars(i) = "1xian"
Case &H5A0B&
	arrChars(i) = "1shao"
Case &H5A0C&
	arrChars(i) = "1li"
Case &H5A0D&
	arrChars(i) = "1cheng"
Case &H5A0E&
	arrChars(i) = "1xie"
Case &H5A0F&
	arrChars(i) = "1mang"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese5AC(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5AC0&
	arrChars(i) = "1qin"
Case &H5AC1&
	arrChars(i) = "1jia"
Case &H5AC2&
	arrChars(i) = "1sao"
Case &H5AC3&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhen"
Case &H5AC4&
	arrChars(i) = "1yuan"
Case &H5AC5&
	arrChars(i) = "1jie"
Case &H5AC6&
	arrChars(i) = "1rong"
Case &H5AC7&
	arrChars(i) = "1ming"
Case &H5AC8&
	arrChars(i) = "1ying"
Case &H5AC9&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
Case &H5ACA&
	arrChars(i) = "1su"
Case &H5ACB&
	arrChars(i) = "1niao"
Case &H5ACC&
	arrChars(i) = "1xian"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6076&
		arrChars(i) = "2xian wu"
	Case &H60E1&
		arrChars(i) = "2xian wu"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5ACD&
	arrChars(i) = "1tao"

Function TransliterateChinese5B8(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5B80&
	arrChars(i) = "1mian"
Case &H5B81&
	arrChars(i) = "1ning"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H590F&
		arrChars(i) = "2Ningxia"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H56DE&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65CF&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H81EA&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H6CBB&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H533A&
							arrChars(i) = "7Ningxia Huizu Zizhiqu"
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6CE2&
		arrChars(i) = "2Ningbo"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Ningbo Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5B82&
	arrChars(i) = "1rong"
Case &H5B83&
	arrChars(i) = "1ta"
Case &H5B84&
	arrChars(i) = "1gui"
Case &H5B85&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhai"
Case &H5B86&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiong"
Case &H5B87&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H5B88&
	arrChars(i) = "1shou"
Case &H5B89&
	arrChars(i) = "1an"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H54E5&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H62C9&
			arrChars(i) = "3Angela"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H572D&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H62C9&
			arrChars(i) = "3Anguila"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5730&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5361&
			arrChars(i) = "3Andika"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5E86&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Anqing Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5FBD&
		arrChars(i) = "2Anhui"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7701&
			arrChars(i) = "3Anhui Sheng"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6176&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Anqing Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6B21&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H533A&
			arrChars(i) = "3Anci Qu"
		Case &H5340&
			arrChars(i) = "3Anci Qu"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9053&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C14&
			arrChars(i) = "3Andao'er"
		Case &H723E&
			arrChars(i) = "3Andao'er"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9592&
		arrChars(i) = "2an xian"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5B8A&
	arrChars(i) = "1tu"
Case &H5B8B&
	arrChars(i) = "1song"
Case &H5B8C&
	arrChars(i) = "1wan"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E86&
		arrChars(i) = "2wan le"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5B8D&
	arrChars(i) = "1rou"
Case &H5B8E&
	arrChars(i) = "1yao"
Case &H5B8F&
	arrChars(i) = "1hong"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7881&
		arrChars(i) = "2hong ji"
	Case &H90FD&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H62C9&

			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&
				arrChars(i) = "4Hongdulasi"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select

	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese5BA(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5BA0&
	arrChars(i) = "1chong"
Case &H5BA1&
	arrChars(i) = "1shen"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5EA6&
		arrChars(i) = "2shen duo"
	Case &H6821&
		arrChars(i) = "2shen jiao"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5BA2&
	arrChars(i) = "1ke"

	Case &H7D71&
		arrChars(i) = "2Xuantong"

Function TransliterateChinese5BC(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5BC0&
	arrChars(i) = "1cai"
Case &H5BC1&
	arrChars(i) = "1zan"
Case &H5BC2&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
Case &H5BC3&
	arrChars(i) = "1yuan"
Case &H5BC4&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
Case &H5BC5&
	arrChars(i) = "1yin"
Case &H5BC6&
	arrChars(i) = "1mi"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H514B&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7F57&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5C3C&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H897F&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H4E9A&
						arrChars(i) = "6Mikeluonixiya"
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H7F85&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5C3C&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H897F&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H4E9E&
						arrChars(i) = "6Mikeluonixiya"
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H897F&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H6839&
			arrChars(i) = "3Mixigen"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9B6F&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5171&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H548C&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H570B&
					arrChars(i) = "5Milu Gongheguo"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9C81&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5171&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H548C&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H56FD&
					arrChars(i) = "5Milu Gongheguo"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5BC7&
	arrChars(i) = "1kou"
Case &H5BC8&
	arrChars(i) = "1qing"
Case &H5BC9&
	arrChars(i) = "1he"
Case &H5BCA&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhen"
Case &H5BCB&
	arrChars(i) = "1jian"
Case &H5BCC&

Case &H5BCD&
	arrChars(i) = "1ning"
Case &H5BCE&
	arrChars(i) = "1bing"
Case &H5BCF&
	arrChars(i) = "1huan"
End Select
End Function
