Function TransliterateChinese5BE(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5BE0&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
Case &H5BE1&
	arrChars(i) = "1gua"
Case &H5BE2&
	arrChars(i) = "1qin"
Case &H5BE3&
	arrChars(i) = "1hu"
Case &H5BE4&
	arrChars(i) = "1wu"
Case &H5BE5&
	arrChars(i) = "1liao"
Case &H5BE6&
	arrChars(i) = "1shi"
Case &H5BE7&
	arrChars(i) = "1ning"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H590F&
		arrChars(i) = "2Ningxia"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H56DE&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65CF&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H81EA&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H6CBB&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H5340&
							arrChars(i) = "7Ningxia Huizu Zizhiqu"
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6CE2&
		arrChars(i) = "2Ningbo"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Ningbo Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5BE8&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhai"
Case &H5BE9&
	arrChars(i) = "1shen"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5EA6&
		arrChars(i) = "2shen duo"
	Case &H6821&
		arrChars(i) = "2shen jiao"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5BEA&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
Case &H5BEB&
	arrChars(i) = "1xie"
Case &H5BEC&
	arrChars(i) = "1kuan"
Case &H5BED&
	arrChars(i) = "1hui"
Case &H5BEE&
	arrChars(i) = "1liao"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H56FD&
		arrChars(i) = "2Liaoguo"
	Case &H570B&
		arrChars(i) = "2Liaoguo"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5BEF&
	arrChars(i) = "1jun"
End Select
End Function

	arrChars(i) = "1zhong"

	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7740&
		arrChars(i) = "2jiu zhe"
	Case &H8457&
		arrChars(i) = "2jiu zhe"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5C32&
	arrChars(i) = "1gan"
Case &H5C33&
	arrChars(i) = "1gu"
Case &H5C34&
	arrChars(i) = "1gan"
Case &H5C35&
	arrChars(i) = "1tui"

	arrChars(i) = "1gan"
Case &H5C37&
	arrChars(i) = "1gan"
Case &H5C38&
	arrChars(i) = "1shi"
Case &H5C39&
	arrChars(i) = "1yin"
Case &H5C3A&
	arrChars(i) = "1chi"
Case &H5C3B&
	arrChars(i) = "1kao"
Case &H5C3C&
	arrChars(i) = "1ni"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H52A0&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H62C9&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then

			Case &H74DC&
				arrChars(i) = "4Nijialagua"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H65E5&
		arrChars(i) = "2Niri"
	Case &H6CCA&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C14&
			arrChars(i) = "3Nibo'er"
		Case &H723E&
			arrChars(i) = "3Nibo'er"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5C3D&
	arrChars(i) = "1jin"
Case &H5C3E&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H690E&
		arrChars(i) = "2wei zhui"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5C3F&
	arrChars(i) = "1niao"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6CE1&
		arrChars(i) = "2sui pao"
	Case &H812C&
		arrChars(i) = "2sui pao"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese5DC(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5DC0&
	arrChars(i) = "1jie"
Case &H5DC1&
	arrChars(i) = "1li"
Case &H5DC2&
	arrChars(i) = "1gui"
Case &H5DC3&
	arrChars(i) = "1long"
Case &H5DC4&
	arrChars(i) = "1long"
Case &H5DC5&
	arrChars(i) = "1dian"
Case &H5DC6&
	arrChars(i) = "1rong"
Case &H5DC7&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
Case &H5DC8&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
Case &H5DC9&
	arrChars(i) = "1chan"
Case &H5DCA&
	arrChars(i) = "1ying"
Case &H5DCB&
	arrChars(i) = "1kui"
Case &H5DCC&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H5DCD&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5C71&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Weishan Xian"
		Case &H7E23&
			arrChars(i) = "3Weishan Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5DCE&
	arrChars(i) = "1nao"
Case &H5DCF&
	arrChars(i) = "1quan"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese5DF(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5DF0&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiu"
Case &H5DF1&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
Case &H5DF2&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi"
Case &H5DF3&
	arrChars(i) = "1si"
Case &H5DF4&
	arrChars(i) = "1ba"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H52D2&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H65AF&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5766&
				arrChars(i) = "4Balesitan"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H54C8&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H99AC&
			arrChars(i) = "3Bahama"
		Case &H9A6C&
			arrChars(i) = "3Bahama"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H57FA&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H65AF&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5766&
				arrChars(i) = "4Bajisitan"
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H4F0A&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H65AF&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H5170&
							If UBound(arrChars) >= i+7 Then
							Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+7))
							Case &H5171&
								If UBound(arrChars) >= i+8 Then
								Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+8))
								Case &H548C&
									If UBound(arrChars) >= i+9 Then
									Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+9))
									Case &H56FD&
										arrChars(i) = "10Bajisitan Yisilan Gongheguo"
									End Select
									End If
								End Select
								End If
							End Select
							End If
						Case &H862D&
							If UBound(arrChars) >= i+7 Then
							Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+7))
							Case &H5171&
								If UBound(arrChars) >= i+8 Then
								Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+8))
								Case &H548C&
									If UBound(arrChars) >= i+9 Then
									Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+9))
									Case &H570B&
										arrChars(i) = "10Bajisitan Yisilan Gongheguo"
									End Select
									End If
								End Select
								End If
							End Select
							End If
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H585E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7F57&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H90A3&
				arrChars(i) = "4Basailuona"
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H7F85&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H90A3&
				arrChars(i) = "4Basailuona"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5E03&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4E9A&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7EBD&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H51E0&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H5185&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H4E9A&
							arrChars(i) = "7Babyua Niujineiya"
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H4E9E&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7D10&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5E7E&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H5167&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H4E9E&
							arrChars(i) = "7Babyua Niujineiya"
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H8FBE&
			arrChars(i) = "3Babuda"
		Case &H9054&
			arrChars(i) = "3Babuda"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H62C9&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H572D&
			arrChars(i) = "3Balagui"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H62FF&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H99AC&
			arrChars(i) = "3Banama"
		Case &H9A6C&
			arrChars(i) = "3Banama"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6797&
		arrChars(i) = "2Balin"
	Case &H683C&

		Case &H9054&
			arrChars(i) = "3Bageda"

		Case &H90ED&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then

			Case &H695E&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H8499&

					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H53E4&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then

						Case &H81EA&
							If UBound(arrChars) >= i+7 Then
							Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+7))
							Case &H6CBB&
								If UBound(arrChars) >= i+8 Then
								Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+8))
								Case &H5DDE&
									arrChars(i) = "9Bayinguoleng Menggu Zizhizhou"
								End Select
								End If
							End Select
							End If
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9ECE&
		arrChars(i) = "2Bali"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5DF5&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhi"
Case &H5DF6&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhao"
Case &H5DF7&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiang"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5F04&
		arrChars(i) = "2xiang long"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5DF8&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi"
Case &H5DF9&
	arrChars(i) = "1jin"
Case &H5DFA&
	arrChars(i) = "1xun"
Case &H5DFB&
	arrChars(i) = "1juan"
Case &H5DFC&
	arrChars(i) = "1ba"
Case &H5DFD&
	arrChars(i) = "1xun"
Case &H5DFE&
	arrChars(i) = "1jin"
Case &H5DFF&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese5E0(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))

Case &H5E02&
	arrChars(i) = "1shi"

			Case &H6CD5&

				Case &H7D22&
					arrChars(i) = "5Bujinafasuo"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select

			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))

				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H827E&

			End Select
			End If
		End Select

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H660E&
		arrChars(i) = "2you - ming"
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1ji"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))

			arrChars(i) = "3Jineiya"
		End Select

	Case &H4E1C&

			arrChars(i) = "3Guangzhou Shi"
		End Select

		Case &H58EE&

			End Select
			End If
		End Select

Function TransliterateChinese5EF(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5EF0&
	arrChars(i) = "1ting"
Case &H5EF1&
	arrChars(i) = "1yong"
Case &H5EF2&
	arrChars(i) = "1li"
Case &H5EF3&
	arrChars(i) = "1ting"
Case &H5EF4&
	arrChars(i) = "1yin"
Case &H5EF5&
	arrChars(i) = "1xun"
Case &H5EF6&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8FB9&
		arrChars(i) = "2Yanbian"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H671D&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H9C9C&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H65CF&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H81EA&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H6CBB&
							If UBound(arrChars) >= i+7 Then
							Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+7))
							Case &H5DDE&
								arrChars(i) = "8Yanbian Chaoxianzu Zizhizhou"
							End Select
							End If
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H908A&
		arrChars(i) = "2Yanbian"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H671D&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H9BAE&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H65CF&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H81EA&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H6CBB&
							If UBound(arrChars) >= i+7 Then
							Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+7))
							Case &H5DDE&
								arrChars(i) = "8Yanbian Chaoxianzu Zizhizhou"
							End Select
							End If
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9577&
		arrChars(i) = "2yan chang"
	Case &H957F&
		arrChars(i) = "2yan chang"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5EF7&
	arrChars(i) = "1ting"
Case &H5EF8&
	arrChars(i) = "1di"
Case &H5EF9&
	arrChars(i) = "1pai"
Case &H5EFA&
	arrChars(i) = "1jian"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6587&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jianwen"
	Case &H884C&
		arrChars(i) = "2jian hang"
	End Select

Case &H5EFB&
	arrChars(i) = "1hui"
Case &H5EFC&
	arrChars(i) = "1nai"
Case &H5EFD&
	arrChars(i) = "1hui"
Case &H5EFE&
	arrChars(i) = "1gong#20"
Case &H5EFF&
	arrChars(i) = "1nian#20"
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese5F0(i As Integer) As String

Case &H5F00&
	arrChars(i) = "1kai"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5C01&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))

			arrChars(i) = "3Kaifeng Shi"
		End Select

			End Select

		Case &H65AF&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7FA4&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5C9B&
					arrChars(i) = "5Kaikesi Qundao"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5F01&
	arrChars(i) = "1bian"
Case &H5F02&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi"
Case &H5F03&
	arrChars(i) = "1qi"

Function TransliterateChinese5F2(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5F20&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhang"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5BB6&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53E3&
			arrChars(i) = "3Zhangjiakou"
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5E02&
				arrChars(i) = "4Zhangjiakou Shi"
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H6E2F&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5E02&
				arrChars(i) = "4Zhangjiagang Shi"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H89D2&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhang jue"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5F21&
	arrChars(i) = "1jue"
Case &H5F22&

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))

			arrChars(i) = "3Mile Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select

Function TransliterateChinese5F3(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5F30&
	arrChars(i) = "1shao"
Case &H5F31&
	arrChars(i) = "1ruo"
Case &H5F32&
	arrChars(i) = "1xuan"

	arrChars(i) = "1jing"
Case &H5F34&
	arrChars(i) = "1diao"

	arrChars(i) = "1zhang"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5BB6&

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53E3&
			arrChars(i) = "3Zhangjiakou"

			Case &H5E02&
				arrChars(i) = "4Zhangjiakou Shi"
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H6E2F&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then

			Case &H5E02&
				arrChars(i) = "4Zhangjiagang Shi"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H89D2&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhang jue"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5F36&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiang"

	arrChars(i) = "1huang"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8F9F&
		arrChars(i) = "2fu bi"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5FAA&
	arrChars(i) = "1xun"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7740&
		arrChars(i) = "2xun zhe"
	Case &H8457&
		arrChars(i) = "2xun zhe"
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
Case &H5FAC&
	arrChars(i) = "1pang"

	arrChars(i) = "1yao"

	arrChars(i) = "1wei"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8584&
		arrChars(i) = "2wei bo"
	Case &H8ABF&
		arrChars(i) = "2wei tiao"
	Case &H8C03&
		arrChars(i) = "2wei tiao"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5FAF&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese5FB(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H5FB0&
	arrChars(i) = "1zheng"
Case &H5FB1&
	arrChars(i) = "1piao"
Case &H5FB2&
	arrChars(i) = "1ti"
Case &H5FB3&
	arrChars(i) = "1de"
Case &H5FB4&
	arrChars(i) = "1zheng"
Case &H5FB5&
	arrChars(i) = "1zheng"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H50B3&
		arrChars(i) = "2zheng zhuan"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5FB6&
	arrChars(i) = "1bie"
Case &H5FB7&
	arrChars(i) = "1de"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H56FD&
		arrChars(i) = "2Deguo"
	Case &H570B&
		arrChars(i) = "2Deguo"
	Case &H610F&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5FD7&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H8054&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H90A6&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H5171&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H548C&
							If UBound(arrChars) >= i+7 Then
							Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+7))
							Case &H56FD&
								arrChars(i) = "8Deyizhi Lianbang Gongheguo"
							End Select
							End If
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			Case &H806F&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H90A6&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H5171&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H548C&
							If UBound(arrChars) >= i+7 Then
							Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+7))
							Case &H570B&
								arrChars(i) = "8Deyizhi Lianbang Gongheguo"
							End Select
							End If
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H5FB8&
	arrChars(i) = "1chong"
Case &H5FB9&
	arrChars(i) = "1che"
Case &H5FBA&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiao"
Case &H5FBB&
	arrChars(i) = "1hui"
Case &H5FBC&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiao"
Case &H5FBD&
	arrChars(i) = "1hui"
Case &H5FBE&
	arrChars(i) = "1mei"
Case &H5FBF&
	arrChars(i) = "1long"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese611(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H6110&
	arrChars(i) = "1mian"

	arrChars(i) = "1yin"
Case &H6115&
	arrChars(i) = "1e"

	arrChars(i) = "1chen"
Case &H6117&
	arrChars(i) = "1mao"
Case &H6118&
	arrChars(i) = "1qia"
Case &H6119&
	arrChars(i) = "1ke"
Case &H611A&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6C13&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu meng"
	Case &H9A03&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu ai"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H611B&
	arrChars(i) = "1ai"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6A02&
		arrChars(i) = "2ai yue"
	Case &H6C99&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C3C&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9E&
				arrChars(i) = "4Aishaniya"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H723E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H862D&
			arrChars(i) = "3Aierlan"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H8377&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H83EF&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5DDE&
				arrChars(i) = "4Aihehua Zhou"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H611C&
	arrChars(i) = "1qie"
Case &H611D&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H611E&
	arrChars(i) = "1nuo"
Case &H611F&
	arrChars(i) = "1gan"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese62C(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H62C0&
	arrChars(i) = "1chu"
Case &H62C1&
	arrChars(i) = "1jia"
Case &H62C2&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H58EB&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi shi"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H62C3&
	arrChars(i) = "1zha"
Case &H62C4&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhu"
Case &H62C5&
	arrChars(i) = "1dan"
Case &H62C6&
	arrChars(i) = "1chai"
Case &H62C7&
	arrChars(i) = "1mu"
Case &H62C8&
	arrChars(i) = "1nian"
Case &H62C9&
	arrChars(i) = "1la"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E01&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7F8E&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H6D32&
				arrChars(i) = "4Lading Mei Zhou"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5471&
		arrChars(i) = "2la gua"
	Case &H812B&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7DAD&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9E&
				arrChars(i) = "4Latuoweiya"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H8131&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7EF4&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Latuoweiya"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H8428&
		arrChars(i) = "2Lasa"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Lasa Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H85A9&
		arrChars(i) = "2Lasa"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Lasa Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9577&
		arrChars(i) = "2la chang"
	Case &H957F&
		arrChars(i) = "2la chang"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H62CA&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
Case &H62CB&
	arrChars(i) = "1pao"
Case &H62CC&
	arrChars(i) = "1ban"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then

Function TransliterateChinese646(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H6460&
	arrChars(i) = "1zong"
Case &H6461&
	arrChars(i) = "1gai"
Case &H6462&
	arrChars(i) = "1hu"
Case &H6463&
	arrChars(i) = "1zha"
Case &H6464&
	arrChars(i) = "1chuang"
Case &H6465&
	arrChars(i) = "1tang"
Case &H6466&
	arrChars(i) = "1hua"
Case &H6467&
	arrChars(i) = "1cui"
Case &H6468&
	arrChars(i) = "1nai"
Case &H6469&
	arrChars(i) = "1mo"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5C14&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H591A&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H74E6&
				arrChars(i) = "4Mo'erduowa"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6332&
		arrChars(i) = "2ma sa"
	Case &H6D1B&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H54E5&
			arrChars(i) = "3Moluoge"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H723E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H591A&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H74E6&
				arrChars(i) = "4Mo'erduowa"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7684&
		arrChars(i) = "2mo di"
	Case &H7D0D&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H54E5&
			arrChars(i) = "3Monage"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7EB3&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H54E5&
			arrChars(i) = "3Monage"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H646A&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiang"
Case &H646B&
	arrChars(i) = "1gui"
Case &H646C&
	arrChars(i) = "1ying"
Case &H646D&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhi"
Case &H646E&
	arrChars(i) = "1ao"
Case &H646F&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhi"
End Select
End Function

		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Wen'an Xian"
		Case &H7E23&
			arrChars(i) = "3Wen'an Xian"
		End Select
		End If

		arrChars(i) = "2wen ge"
	End Select
	End If

Function TransliterateChinese65B(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H65B0&
	arrChars(i) = "1xin"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E61&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xinxiang Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H4F1A&
		arrChars(i) = "2Xinhui"
	Case &H52A0&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5761&

			Case &H5E02&

			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5580&

		Case &H88CF&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H591A&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5C3C&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H4E9E&
						arrChars(i) = "6Xinkaliduoniya"
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H91CC&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H591A&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5C3C&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H4E9A&
						arrChars(i) = "6Xinkaliduoniya"
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If

		arrChars(i) = "2xin pu"

Function TransliterateChinese68D(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H68D0&
	arrChars(i) = "1fei"
Case &H68D1&
	arrChars(i) = "1pai"
Case &H68D2&
	arrChars(i) = "1bang"
Case &H68D3&
	arrChars(i) = "1bang"
Case &H68D4&
	arrChars(i) = "1hun"
Case &H68D5&
	arrChars(i) = "1zong"
Case &H68D6&
	arrChars(i) = "1cheng"
Case &H68D7&
	arrChars(i) = "1zao"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H838A&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Zaozhuang Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4EAD&
		arrChars(i) = "2lao ting"
	Case &H53E5&

		arrChars(i) = "2yue shou"
	Case &H66F2&
		arrChars(i) = "2yue qu"
	Case &H6E05&
		arrChars(i) = "2yue qing"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Yueqing Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7406&
		arrChars(i) = "2yue li"
	Case &H7AE0&
		arrChars(i) = "2yue zhang"
	Case &H7D93&
		arrChars(i) = "2yue jing"

		arrChars(i) = "2yue dui"

		arrChars(i) = "2yue yin"

	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1lang"
Case &H6A04&
	arrChars(i) = "1chen"

	arrChars(i) = "1cong"

Case &H6CC8&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhong"
Case &H6CC9&
	arrChars(i) = "1quan"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5DDE&
		arrChars(i) = "2Quanzhou"

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Quanzhou Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H6CCA&
	arrChars(i) = "1po"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4F4D&
		arrChars(i) = "2bo wei"
	Case &H677E&
		arrChars(i) = "2bo song"
	Case &H8ECA&
		arrChars(i) = "2bo che"
	Case &H8F66&
		arrChars(i) = "2bo che"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H6CCB&
	arrChars(i) = "1hui"
Case &H6CCC&
	arrChars(i) = "1mi"

	Case &H9633&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi yang"

Function TransliterateChinese6CD(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H6CD0&
	arrChars(i) = "1le"
Case &H6CD1&
	arrChars(i) = "1you"
Case &H6CD2&
	arrChars(i) = "1gu"
Case &H6CD3&

Case &H6CD4&
	arrChars(i) = "1gan"
Case &H6CD5&

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H56FD&
		arrChars(i) = "2Faguo"
	Case &H570B&
		arrChars(i) = "2Faguo"
	Case &H5C5E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H572D&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9A&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H90A3&
					arrChars(i) = "5Fashuguiyana"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H76D6&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9A&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H7EB3&
					arrChars(i) = "5Fashugaiyana"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5C6C&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H572D&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9E&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H90A3&
					arrChars(i) = "5Fashuguiyana"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If

			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then

				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H7D0D&
					arrChars(i) = "5Fashugaiyana"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7F57&

				arrChars(i) = "4Faluo Qundao"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select

Case &H6CD6&
	arrChars(i) = "1mao"
Case &H6CD7&
	arrChars(i) = "1si"
Case &H6CD8&

			arrChars(i) = "3Taixing Shi"
		End Select

	Case &H963F&
		arrChars(i) = "2tai e"
	End Select

	arrChars(i) = "1yang"

Case &H6D65&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi"
Case &H6D66&
	arrChars(i) = "1pu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E1C&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H65B0&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then

			Case &H533A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Pudong Xinqu"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6771&

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H65B0&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5340&
				arrChars(i) = "4Pudong Xinqu"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9686&

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H8FEA&
			arrChars(i) = "3Pulongdi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1ying"
Case &H6D68&
	arrChars(i) = "1lan"
Case &H6D69&
	arrChars(i) = "1hao"

	Case &H53BF&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then

		Case &H5730&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then

			Case &H533A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Chu Xian Diqu"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select

			Case &H5340&
				arrChars(i) = "4Chu Xian Diqu"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1pang"
Case &H6EC3&
	arrChars(i) = "1weng"
Case &H6EC4&
	arrChars(i) = "1cang"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))

			arrChars(i) = "3Cangzhou Shi"
		End Select

	arrChars(i) = "1ge"

		End Select

			arrChars(i) = "3Binhu Qu"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select

	arrChars(i) = "1tan"

			arrChars(i) = "3Shenyang Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1biao"

Function TransliterateChinese70C(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H70C0&
	arrChars(i) = "1hu"
Case &H70C1&
	arrChars(i) = "1shuo"
Case &H70C2&
	arrChars(i) = "1lan"
Case &H70C3&
	arrChars(i) = "1ting"
Case &H70C4&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiao"
Case &H70C5&
	arrChars(i) = "1xu"
Case &H70C6&
	arrChars(i) = "1heng"
Case &H70C7&
	arrChars(i) = "1quan"
Case &H70C8&
	arrChars(i) = "1lie"
Case &H70C9&
	arrChars(i) = "1huan"
Case &H70CA&
	arrChars(i) = "1yang"
Case &H70CB&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiu"
Case &H70CC&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiu"
Case &H70CD&
	arrChars(i) = "1xian"
Case &H70CE&
	arrChars(i) = "1yin"
Case &H70CF&
	arrChars(i) = "1wu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4EC0&
		arrChars(i) = "2wu shi"
	Case &H62C9&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H572D&
			arrChars(i) = "3Wulagui"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H8332&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5225&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H514B&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H65AF&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H5766&
						arrChars(i) = "6Wuzibiekesitan"
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9B6F&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H6728&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H9F4A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Wulumuqi"
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5E02&
					arrChars(i) = "5Wulumuqi Shi"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

	arrChars(i) = "1po"
Case &H70DF&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H53F0&
		arrChars(i) = "2Yantai"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Yantai Shi"
		End Select
		End If

		arrChars(i) = "2Yantai"

		Case &H5E02&

		End Select

Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H7110&
	arrChars(i) = "1wu"
Case &H7111&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H7112&
	arrChars(i) = "1lu&#x0308;"
Case &H7113&
	arrChars(i) = "1han"
Case &H7114&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H7115&
	arrChars(i) = "1huan"
Case &H7116&
	arrChars(i) = "1men"
Case &H7117&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
Case &H7118&
	arrChars(i) = "1dao"
Case &H7119&
	arrChars(i) = "1bei"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E7E&
		arrChars(i) = "2bei gan"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H711A&
	arrChars(i) = "1fen"
Case &H711B&
	arrChars(i) = "1lin"
Case &H711C&
	arrChars(i) = "1kun"
Case &H711D&

	arrChars(i) = "1cui"

	arrChars(i) = "1wu"

		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Wuxi Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7122&
	arrChars(i) = "1hong"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8089&
		arrChars(i) = "2kong rou"

	Case &H53F0&
		arrChars(i) = "2Yantai"

		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Yantai Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H81FA&
		arrChars(i) = "2Yantai"

		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Yantai Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1jiong"

				arrChars(i) = "4Aishaniya"
			End Select

Function TransliterateChinese73B(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H73B0&
	arrChars(i) = "1xian"
Case &H73B1&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiang"
Case &H73B2&
	arrChars(i) = "1ling"
Case &H73B3&
	arrChars(i) = "1dai"
Case &H73B4&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi"
Case &H73B5&
	arrChars(i) = "1an"
Case &H73B6&
	arrChars(i) = "1ping"
Case &H73B7&
	arrChars(i) = "1dian"
Case &H73B8&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
Case &H73B9&
	arrChars(i) = "1xuan"
Case &H73BA&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
Case &H73BB&
	arrChars(i) = "1bo"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5229&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7DAD&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9E&
				arrChars(i) = "4Boliweiya"
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H7EF4&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Boliweiya"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H88CF&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C3C&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H897F&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H4E9E&
					arrChars(i) = "5Bolinixiya"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H91CC&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C3C&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H897F&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H4E9A&
					arrChars(i) = "5Bolinixiya"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H73BC&
	arrChars(i) = "1ci"
Case &H73BD&
	arrChars(i) = "1gou"
Case &H73BE&
	arrChars(i) = "1jia"
Case &H73BF&
	arrChars(i) = "1shao"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese751(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H7510&
	arrChars(i) = "1lin"
Case &H7511&
	arrChars(i) = "1zeng"
Case &H7512&
	arrChars(i) = "1wu"
Case &H7513&
	arrChars(i) = "1pi"
Case &H7514&
	arrChars(i) = "1dan"
Case &H7515&
	arrChars(i) = "1weng"
Case &H7516&
	arrChars(i) = "1ying"
Case &H7517&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H7518&
	arrChars(i) = "1gan"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5B5C&
		arrChars(i) = "2Ganzi"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H85CF&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65CF&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H81EA&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H6CBB&
						If UBound(arrChars) >= i+6 Then
						Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+6))
						Case &H5DDE&
							arrChars(i) = "7Ganzi Zangzu Zizhizhou"
						End Select
						End If
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6BD4&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4E9A&
			arrChars(i) = "3Ganbiya"
		Case &H4E9E&
			arrChars(i) = "3Ganbiya"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H8083&
		arrChars(i) = "2Gansu"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7701&
			arrChars(i) = "3Gansu Sheng"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H8085&
		arrChars(i) = "2Gansu"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7701&
			arrChars(i) = "3Gansu Sheng"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7519&
	arrChars(i) = "1dai"
Case &H751A&
	arrChars(i) = "1shen"
Case &H751B&
	arrChars(i) = "1tian"
Case &H751C&
	arrChars(i) = "1tian"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6A59&
		arrChars(i) = "2tian cheng"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H751D&
	arrChars(i) = "1han"
Case &H751E&
	arrChars(i) = "1chang"
Case &H751F&
	arrChars(i) = "1sheng"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8FD8&
		arrChars(i) = "2sheng huan"
	Case &H9084&
		arrChars(i) = "2sheng huan"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

	arrChars(i) = "1fu"

Case &H7558&
	arrChars(i) = "1nan"
Case &H7559&
	arrChars(i) = "1liu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5C3C&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H65FA&
			arrChars(i) = "3Liuniwang"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H755A&
	arrChars(i) = "1ben"

End Select

				arrChars(i) = "4Bai'eluosi"
			End Select

			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&

			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9F13&
		arrChars(i) = "2dan gu"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H77F4&
	arrChars(i) = "1ding"
Case &H77F5&

	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4F3C&
		arrChars(i) = "2shen si"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H795F&
	arrChars(i) = "1sui"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese798(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H7980&
	arrChars(i) = "1bing"
Case &H7981&
	arrChars(i) = "1jin"
Case &H7982&
	arrChars(i) = "1dao"
Case &H7983&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhi"
Case &H7984&
	arrChars(i) = "1lu"
Case &H7985&
	arrChars(i) = "1chan"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4F4D&
		arrChars(i) = "2shan wei"
	Case &H8BA9&
		arrChars(i) = "2shan rang"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7986&
	arrChars(i) = "1bi"
Case &H7987&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhe"
Case &H7988&
	arrChars(i) = "1hui"
Case &H7989&
	arrChars(i) = "1you"
Case &H798A&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
Case &H798B&
	arrChars(i) = "1yin"
Case &H798C&
	arrChars(i) = "1zi"
Case &H798D&
	arrChars(i) = "1huo"
Case &H798E&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhen"
Case &H798F&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H514B&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5170&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7FA4&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5C9B&
					arrChars(i) = "5Fukelan Qundao"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H862D&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7FA4&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5CF6&
					arrChars(i) = "5Fukelan Qundao"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5DDE&
		arrChars(i) = "2Fuzhou"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Fuzhou Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5EFA&
		arrChars(i) = "2Fujian"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7701&
			arrChars(i) = "3Fujian Sheng"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese7A7(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H7A70&
	arrChars(i) = "1rang"
Case &H7A71&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhuo"
Case &H7A72&
	arrChars(i) = "1li"
Case &H7A73&
	arrChars(i) = "1cuan"
Case &H7A74&
	arrChars(i) = "1xue"
Case &H7A75&
	arrChars(i) = "1wa"
Case &H7A76&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiu"
Case &H7A77&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiong"
Case &H7A78&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
Case &H7A79&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiong"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H808B&
		arrChars(i) = "2qiong lei"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7A7A&
	arrChars(i) = "1kong"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5331&
		arrChars(i) = "2kong kui"
	Case &H8ABF&
		arrChars(i) = "2kong tiao"
	Case &H8C03&
		arrChars(i) = "2kong tiao"
	Case &H9592&
		arrChars(i) = "2kong xian"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7A7B&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H7A7C&
	arrChars(i) = "1shen"
Case &H7A7D&
	arrChars(i) = "1jing"
Case &H7A7E&
	arrChars(i) = "1yao"
Case &H7A7F&
	arrChars(i) = "1chuan"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7740&
		arrChars(i) = "2chuan zhuo"
	Case &H8457&
		arrChars(i) = "2chuan zhuo"

	End If
End Select

		Case &H5B9B&

		End Select

	End Select

Function TransliterateChinese7D0(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H7D00&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
Case &H7D01&
	arrChars(i) = "1cha"
Case &H7D02&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhou"

	arrChars(i) = "1xun"
Case &H7D04&
	arrChars(i) = "1yue"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5854&
		arrChars(i) = "2yao ta"
	Case &H65E6&
		arrChars(i) = "2Yuedan"
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1hong"

	Case &H6A59&
		arrChars(i) = "2hong cheng"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7D06&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H7D07&
	arrChars(i) = "1he"
Case &H7D08&
	arrChars(i) = "1wan"
Case &H7D09&
	arrChars(i) = "1ren"
Case &H7D0A&
	arrChars(i) = "1wen"
Case &H7D0B&
	arrChars(i) = "1wen"
Case &H7D0C&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiu"
Case &H7D0D&
	arrChars(i) = "1na"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4EC0&
		arrChars(i) = "2na shi"
	Case &H74E6&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H85A9&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5CF6&
				arrChars(i) = "4Nawasadao"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7C73&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H6BD4&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9E&
				arrChars(i) = "4Namibiya"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H897F&
		arrChars(i) = "2Naxi"
	Case &H964D&
		arrChars(i) = "2na xiang"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7D0E&
	arrChars(i) = "1zi"
Case &H7D0F&
	arrChars(i) = "1tou"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese7DA(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H7DA0&
	arrChars(i) = "1lu&#x0308;"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6797&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu lin"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7DA1&
	arrChars(i) = "1liang"
Case &H7DA2&
	arrChars(i) = "1chou"
Case &H7DA3&
	arrChars(i) = "1quan"
Case &H7DA4&
	arrChars(i) = "1shao"
Case &H7DA5&
	arrChars(i) = "1qi"
Case &H7DA6&
	arrChars(i) = "1qi"
Case &H7DA7&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhun"
Case &H7DA8&
	arrChars(i) = "1qi"
Case &H7DA9&
	arrChars(i) = "1wan"
Case &H7DAA&
	arrChars(i) = "1qian"
Case &H7DAB&
	arrChars(i) = "1xian"
Case &H7DAC&
	arrChars(i) = "1shou"
Case &H7DAD&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H514B&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5CF6&
			arrChars(i) = "3Weikedao"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H543E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H723E&
			arrChars(i) = "3Weiwuer"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5FB7&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H89D2&
			arrChars(i) = "3Weidejiao"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H723E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4EAC&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7FA4&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5CF6&
					arrChars(i) = "5Wei'erjing Qundao"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7DAE&
	arrChars(i) = "1qi"
Case &H7DAF&
	arrChars(i) = "1tao"
End Select
End Function

		End Select

	Case &H964D&

	End Select
	End If
Case &H7EB4&
	arrChars(i) = "1ren"

Case &H7EB6&

Function TransliterateChinese7EF(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H7EF0&
	arrChars(i) = "1chao"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H53F7&
		arrChars(i) = "2chuo hao"
	Case &H540D&
		arrChars(i) = "2chuo ming"
	Case &H7EA6&
		arrChars(i) = "2chuo yue"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7EF1&
	arrChars(i) = "1shang"
Case &H7EF2&
	arrChars(i) = "1gun"
Case &H7EF3&
	arrChars(i) = "1sheng"
Case &H7EF4&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H514B&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C9B&
			arrChars(i) = "3Weikedao"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H543E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C14&
			arrChars(i) = "3Weiwuer"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5C14&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4EAC&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7FA4&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5C9B&
					arrChars(i) = "5Wei'erjing Qundao"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5FB7&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H89D2&
			arrChars(i) = "3Weidejiao"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7EF5&
	arrChars(i) = "1mian"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8584&
		arrChars(i) = "2mian bo"
	Case &H957F&
		arrChars(i) = "2mian chang"
	Case &H9633&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Mianyang Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7EF6&
	arrChars(i) = "1shou"
Case &H7EF7&
	arrChars(i) = "1beng"
Case &H7EF8&
	arrChars(i) = "1chou"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7F2A&
		arrChars(i) = "2chou mou"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H7EF9&
	arrChars(i) = "1tao"
Case &H7EFA&
	arrChars(i) = "1liu"

	arrChars(i) = "1quan"

	arrChars(i) = "1zong"

	arrChars(i) = "1zhan"

	arrChars(i) = "1wan"
Case &H7EFF&

Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8040&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhi"
Case &H8041&
	arrChars(i) = "1pan"
Case &H8042&
	arrChars(i) = "1nie"
Case &H8043&
	arrChars(i) = "1dan"
Case &H8044&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhen"
Case &H8045&
	arrChars(i) = "1che"
Case &H8046&
	arrChars(i) = "1ling"
Case &H8047&
	arrChars(i) = "1zheng"
Case &H8048&
	arrChars(i) = "1you"
Case &H8049&
	arrChars(i) = "1wa"
Case &H804A&
	arrChars(i) = "1liao"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H57CE&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5730&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H533A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Liaocheng Diqu"
			Case &H5340&
				arrChars(i) = "4Liaocheng Diqu"
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Liaocheng Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1long"
Case &H804C&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhi"

Function TransliterateChinese805(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8050&
	arrChars(i) = "1ya"
Case &H8051&
	arrChars(i) = "1tie"
Case &H8052&
	arrChars(i) = "1guo"
Case &H8053&
	arrChars(i) = "1xu"
Case &H8054&
	arrChars(i) = "1lian"
Case &H8055&
	arrChars(i) = "1hao"
Case &H8056&
	arrChars(i) = "1sheng"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H591A&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7F8E&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shengduomei"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6587&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H68EE&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shengwensen"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6A02&
		arrChars(i) = "2sheng yue"
	Case &H8A95&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5CF6&
			arrChars(i) = "3Shengdandao"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9732&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H897F&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9E&
				arrChars(i) = "4Shengluxiya"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H99AC&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H529B&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H8AFE&
				arrChars(i) = "4Shengmalinuo"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8057&
	arrChars(i) = "1lie"
Case &H8058&
	arrChars(i) = "1pin"
Case &H8059&
	arrChars(i) = "1jing"
Case &H805A&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
Case &H805B&
	arrChars(i) = "1bi"
Case &H805C&
	arrChars(i) = "1di"
Case &H805D&
	arrChars(i) = "1guo"
Case &H805E&
	arrChars(i) = "1wen"
Case &H805F&
	arrChars(i) = "1xu"
End Select
End Function

	arrChars(i) = "1guang"
Case &H81E7&
	arrChars(i) = "1zang"
Case &H81E8&
	arrChars(i) = "1lin"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H590F&

		Case &H7E23&
			arrChars(i) = "3Linxia Xian"
		End Select

				arrChars(i) = "4Linyi Diqu"
			End Select
			End If

			arrChars(i) = "3Linhai Shi"
		End Select

			arrChars(i) = "3Linli Xian"
		End Select

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))

			arrChars(i) = "3Taizhong Shi"
		End Select
		End If

		End Select

		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Tainan Shi"
		End Select
		End If

		arrChars(i) = "2Taiwan"
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1zhen"
Case &H81FC&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiu"

	arrChars(i) = "1xian"
Case &H81FE&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"

		End Select

				arrChars(i) = "4Yingshuyindu"
			End Select

			Case &H5EA6&
				arrChars(i) = "4Yingshuyindu"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H683C&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5170&
			arrChars(i) = "3Yinggelan"
		Case &H862D&
			arrChars(i) = "3Yinggelan"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H77F3&
		arrChars(i) = "2ying dan"
	Case &H938A&
		arrChars(i) = "2ying bang"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H82F2&
	arrChars(i) = "1zha"

	arrChars(i) = "1dong"

	Case &H5EC1&

			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H66FF&

	arrChars(i) = "1lang"
Case &H8498&
	arrChars(i) = "1ru"
Case &H8499&
	arrChars(i) = "1meng"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H53E4&
		arrChars(i) = "2Menggu"
	Case &H7279&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H8272&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H62C9&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H7279&
					If UBound(arrChars) >= i+5 Then
					Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+5))
					Case &H5C9B&
						arrChars(i) = "6Mengteselatedao"
					Case &H5CF6&
						arrChars(i) = "6Mengteselatedao"
					End Select
					End If
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H849A&
	arrChars(i) = "1li"
Case &H849B&
	arrChars(i) = "1que"
Case &H849C&
	arrChars(i) = "1suan"

	arrChars(i) = "1yuan"
Case &H849E&
	arrChars(i) = "1li"
Case &H849F&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
End Select

Function TransliterateChinese85A(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H85A0&
	arrChars(i) = "1fan"
Case &H85A1&
	arrChars(i) = "1ding"
Case &H85A2&
	arrChars(i) = "1xie"
Case &H85A3&
	arrChars(i) = "1gu"
Case &H85A4&
	arrChars(i) = "1xie"
Case &H85A5&
	arrChars(i) = "1shu"
Case &H85A6&
	arrChars(i) = "1jian"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H690E&
		arrChars(i) = "2jian zhui"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H85A7&
	arrChars(i) = "1hao"
Case &H85A8&
	arrChars(i) = "1hong"
Case &H85A9&
	arrChars(i) = "1sa"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6469&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4E9E&
			arrChars(i) = "3Samoya"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H723E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H74E6&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H591A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Sa'erwaduo"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H85AA&
	arrChars(i) = "1xin"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7D66&
		arrChars(i) = "2xin ji"
	Case &H7ED9&
		arrChars(i) = "2xin ji"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H85AB&
	arrChars(i) = "1xun"
Case &H85AC&
	arrChars(i) = "1yao"
Case &H85AD&
	arrChars(i) = "1bai"
Case &H85AE&
	arrChars(i) = "1sou"
Case &H85AF&
	arrChars(i) = "1shu"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese860(i As Integer) As String

	arrChars(i) = "1tuo"

	arrChars(i) = "1heng"

	arrChars(i) = "1lu"
Case &H8607&
	arrChars(i) = "1su"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5DDE&
		arrChars(i) = "2Suzhou"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Suzhou Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8608&
	arrChars(i) = "1tui"
Case &H8609&
	arrChars(i) = "1meng"
Case &H860A&
	arrChars(i) = "1yun"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H85C9&
		arrChars(i) = "2yun jie"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H860B&
	arrChars(i) = "1ping"

	arrChars(i) = "1xun"
Case &H860E&

Function TransliterateChinese897(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8970&
	arrChars(i) = "1lai"
Case &H8971&
	arrChars(i) = "1long"
Case &H8972&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
Case &H8973&
	arrChars(i) = "1xian"
Case &H8974&
	arrChars(i) = "1lan"
Case &H8975&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhe"
Case &H8976&
	arrChars(i) = "1dai"
Case &H8977&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
Case &H8978&
	arrChars(i) = "1zan"
Case &H8979&
	arrChars(i) = "1shi"
Case &H897A&
	arrChars(i) = "1jian"
Case &H897B&
	arrChars(i) = "1pan"
Case &H897C&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi"
Case &H897D&
	arrChars(i) = "1lan"
Case &H897E&
	arrChars(i) = "1ya"
Case &H897F&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H57CE&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H533A&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xicheng Qu"
		Case &H5340&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xicheng Qu"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H590F&
		arrChars(i) = "2Xi Xia"
	Case &H5B81&
		arrChars(i) = "2Xining"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xining Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5B89&
		arrChars(i) = "2Xi'an"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xi'an Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5BE7&
		arrChars(i) = "2Xining"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xining Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5C97&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H533A&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xigang Qu"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5D17&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5340&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xigang Qu"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H85CF&
		arrChars(i) = "2Xizang"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese8A7(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8A70&
	arrChars(i) = "1jie"
Case &H8A71&
	arrChars(i) = "1hua"
Case &H8A72&
	arrChars(i) = "1gai"
Case &H8A73&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiang"
Case &H8A74&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"

	arrChars(i) = "1mi"
Case &H8A79&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhan"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H65AF&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H9813&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5CF6&
				arrChars(i) = "4Zhansidundao"
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H987F&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5C9B&
				arrChars(i) = "4Zhansidundao"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8A7A&
	arrChars(i) = "1ming"
Case &H8A7B&
	arrChars(i) = "1e"
Case &H8A7C&
	arrChars(i) = "1hui"

	arrChars(i) = "1yan"

	Case &H97F3&
		arrChars(i) = "2tiao yin"
	Case &H983B&
		arrChars(i) = "2tiao pin"
	Case &H990A&
		arrChars(i) = "2tiao yang"
	Case &H99B4&
		arrChars(i) = "2tiao xun"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese8AF(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8AF0&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
Case &H8AF1&
	arrChars(i) = "1hui"
Case &H8AF2&
	arrChars(i) = "1yin"
Case &H8AF3&
	arrChars(i) = "1an"
Case &H8AF4&
	arrChars(i) = "1xian"
Case &H8AF5&
	arrChars(i) = "1nan"
Case &H8AF6&
	arrChars(i) = "1chen"
Case &H8AF7&
	arrChars(i) = "1feng"
Case &H8AF8&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhu"
Case &H8AF9&
	arrChars(i) = "1yang"
Case &H8AFA&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H8AFB&
	arrChars(i) = "1huang"
Case &H8AFC&
	arrChars(i) = "1xuan"
Case &H8AFD&
	arrChars(i) = "1ge"
Case &H8AFE&
	arrChars(i) = "1nuo"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H798F&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H514B&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5CF6&
				arrChars(i) = "4Nuofukedao"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9B6F&
		arrChars(i) = "2Nuolu"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8AFF&
	arrChars(i) = "1qi"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese8BF(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8BF0&
	arrChars(i) = "1gao"
Case &H8BF1&
	arrChars(i) = "1you"
Case &H8BF2&
	arrChars(i) = "1hui"
Case &H8BF3&
	arrChars(i) = "1kuang"
Case &H8BF4&
	arrChars(i) = "1shuo"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5BA2&
		arrChars(i) = "2shui ke"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8BF5&
	arrChars(i) = "1song"
Case &H8BF6&
	arrChars(i) = "1ei"
Case &H8BF7&
	arrChars(i) = "1qing"
Case &H8BF8&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhu"
Case &H8BF9&
	arrChars(i) = "1zou"
Case &H8BFA&
	arrChars(i) = "1nuo"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H798F&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H514B&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5C9B&
				arrChars(i) = "4Nuofukedao"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9C81&
		arrChars(i) = "2Nuolu"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8BFB&
	arrChars(i) = "1du"
Case &H8BFC&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhuo"
Case &H8BFD&
	arrChars(i) = "1fei"
Case &H8BFE&
	arrChars(i) = "1ke"
Case &H8BFF&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese8C1(i As Integer) As String

Case &H8C10&
	arrChars(i) = "1xie"

	arrChars(i) = "1xue"
Case &H8C12&
	arrChars(i) = "1ye"
Case &H8C13&
	arrChars(i) = "1wei"
Case &H8C14&
	arrChars(i) = "1e"

	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H8C1B&
	arrChars(i) = "1di"
Case &H8C1C&
	arrChars(i) = "1mei"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H56E2&
		arrChars(i) = "2mi tuan"
	Case &H5E95&
		arrChars(i) = "2mi di"
	Case &H6837&
		arrChars(i) = "2mi yang"
	Case &H8BED&
		arrChars(i) = "2mi yu"
	Case &H9762&
		arrChars(i) = "2mi mian"
	Case &H9898&
		arrChars(i) = "2mi ti"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8C1D&
	arrChars(i) = "1pian"
Case &H8C1E&
	arrChars(i) = "1xu"
Case &H8C1F&
	arrChars(i) = "1mo"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese8C6(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8C60&
	arrChars(i) = "1chu"
Case &H8C61&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiang"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7259&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H6D77&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5CB8&
				arrChars(i) = "4Xiangyahaian"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8C62&
	arrChars(i) = "1huan"
Case &H8C63&
	arrChars(i) = "1jian"
Case &H8C64&
	arrChars(i) = "1ken"
Case &H8C65&
	arrChars(i) = "1gai"
Case &H8C66&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
Case &H8C67&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
Case &H8C68&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
Case &H8C69&
	arrChars(i) = "1bin"
Case &H8C6A&
	arrChars(i) = "1hao"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5170&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C9B&
			arrChars(i) = "3Haolandao"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H862D&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5CF6&
			arrChars(i) = "3Haolandao"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8C6B&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H8C6C&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4ED4&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhu zai"
	Case &H5708&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhu juan"
	Case &H6252&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhu pa"
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1jia"
Case &H8C6E&
	arrChars(i) = "1fen"
Case &H8C6F&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
End Select

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))

			arrChars(i) = "3Beikedao"
		End Select
		End If

		End Select

	End Select

Function TransliterateChinese8CA(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8CA0&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
Case &H8CA1&
	arrChars(i) = "1cai"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6703&
		arrChars(i) = "2cai kuai"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8CA2&
	arrChars(i) = "1gong"
Case &H8CA3&
	arrChars(i) = "1te"
Case &H8CA4&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi"
Case &H8CA5&
	arrChars(i) = "1hang"
Case &H8CA6&
	arrChars(i) = "1wan"

Function TransliterateChinese8CB(i As Integer) As String

	arrChars(i) = "1shi"

Case &H8CB2&
	arrChars(i) = "1zi"
Case &H8CB3&
	arrChars(i) = "1er"
Case &H8CB4&
	arrChars(i) = "1gui"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5DDE&
		arrChars(i) = "2Guizhou"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7701&
			arrChars(i) = "3Guizhou Sheng"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H967D&
		arrChars(i) = "2Guiyang"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Guiyang Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8CB5&
	arrChars(i) = "1pian"
Case &H8CB6&
	arrChars(i) = "1bian"
Case &H8CB7&
	arrChars(i) = "1mai"
Case &H8CB8&
	arrChars(i) = "1dai"

End Select

Function TransliterateChinese8CF(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8CF0&
	arrChars(i) = "1chun"
Case &H8CF1&
	arrChars(i) = "1yun"
Case &H8CF2&
	arrChars(i) = "1bao"
Case &H8CF3&
	arrChars(i) = "1zai"
Case &H8CF4&
	arrChars(i) = "1lai"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7D22&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H6258&
			arrChars(i) = "3Laisuotuo"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8CF5&
	arrChars(i) = "1feng"
Case &H8CF6&
	arrChars(i) = "1cang"
Case &H8CF7&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
Case &H8CF8&
	arrChars(i) = "1sheng"
Case &H8CF9&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi"
Case &H8CFA&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhuan"
Case &H8CFB&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
Case &H8CFC&
	arrChars(i) = "1gou"
Case &H8CFD&
	arrChars(i) = "1sai"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H666E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H52D2&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&
				arrChars(i) = "4Saipulesi"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8CFE&
	arrChars(i) = "1ze"
Case &H8CFF&
	arrChars(i) = "1liao"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese8D1(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8D10&
	arrChars(i) = "1jin"
Case &H8D11&
	arrChars(i) = "1gan"
Case &H8D12&
	arrChars(i) = "1xian"
Case &H8D13&
	arrChars(i) = "1zang"
Case &H8D14&
	arrChars(i) = "1bi"
Case &H8D15&
	arrChars(i) = "1du"
Case &H8D16&
	arrChars(i) = "1shu"
Case &H8D17&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H8D18&
	arrChars(i) = "1shang"
Case &H8D19&
	arrChars(i) = "1xuan"
Case &H8D1A&
	arrChars(i) = "1long"
Case &H8D1B&
	arrChars(i) = "1gong"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5DDE&
		arrChars(i) = "2gan zhou"
	Case &H6C5F&
		arrChars(i) = "2gan jiang"
	Case &H8A9E&
		arrChars(i) = "2gan yu"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8D1C&
	arrChars(i) = "1zang"
Case &H8D1D&
	arrChars(i) = "1bei"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H514B&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C9B&
			arrChars(i) = "3Beikedao"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5357&
		arrChars(i) = "2Beinan"
	Case &H91CC&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H65AF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Beilisi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9C81&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7279&
			arrChars(i) = "3Beilute"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8D1E&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhen"
Case &H8D1F&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese8D6(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8D60&
	arrChars(i) = "1zeng"
Case &H8D61&
	arrChars(i) = "1shan"
Case &H8D62&
	arrChars(i) = "1ying"
Case &H8D63&
	arrChars(i) = "1gan"
Case &H8D64&
	arrChars(i) = "1chi"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H9053&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H51E0&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5185&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H4E9A&
					arrChars(i) = "5Chidaojineiya"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H5E7E&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5167&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H4E9E&
					arrChars(i) = "5Chidaojineiya"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8D65&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
Case &H8D66&
	arrChars(i) = "1she"
Case &H8D67&
	arrChars(i) = "1nan"
Case &H8D68&
	arrChars(i) = "1tong"
Case &H8D69&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
Case &H8D6A&
	arrChars(i) = "1cheng"
Case &H8D6B&
	arrChars(i) = "1he"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5179&
		arrChars(i) = "2he zi"
	Case &H585E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H6B4C&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7DAD&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H7D0D&
					arrChars(i) = "5Hesaigeweina"
				End Select
				End If
			Case &H7EF4&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H7EB3&
					arrChars(i) = "5Hesaigeweina"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5FB7&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C9B&
			arrChars(i) = "3Hededao"
		Case &H5CF6&
			arrChars(i) = "3Hededao"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8D6C&
	arrChars(i) = "1cheng"
Case &H8D6D&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhe"
Case &H8D6E&
	arrChars(i) = "1xia"
Case &H8D6F&
	arrChars(i) = "1tang"
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese8D7(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8D70&
	arrChars(i) = "1zou"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5352&
		arrChars(i) = "2zou zu"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8D71&
	arrChars(i) = "1zou"
Case &H8D72&
	arrChars(i) = "1li"
Case &H8D73&
	arrChars(i) = "1jiu"
Case &H8D74&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7F8E&

	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1zhao"

	Case &H7740&
		arrChars(i) = "2shen zhuo"
	Case &H8457&

		arrChars(i) = "2shen chang"
	Case &H957F&
		arrChars(i) = "2shen chang"

	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1gong"

	arrChars(i) = "1fen"

Function TransliterateChinese8F9(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H8F90&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
Case &H8F91&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6821&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji jiao"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8F92&
	arrChars(i) = "1wen"
Case &H8F93&
	arrChars(i) = "1shu"
Case &H8F94&
	arrChars(i) = "1pei"
Case &H8F95&
	arrChars(i) = "1yuan"
Case &H8F96&
	arrChars(i) = "1xia"
Case &H8F97&
	arrChars(i) = "1nian"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8F67&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhan ya"
	Case &H8F6C&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhan zhuan"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8F98&
	arrChars(i) = "1lu"
Case &H8F99&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhe"
Case &H8F9A&
	arrChars(i) = "1lin"
Case &H8F9B&
	arrChars(i) = "1xin"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5DF4&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5A01&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xinbawei"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H8F9C&
	arrChars(i) = "1gu"
Case &H8F9D&
	arrChars(i) = "1ci"
Case &H8F9E&
	arrChars(i) = "1ci"
Case &H8F9F&
	arrChars(i) = "1pi"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H7A40&

	End If

End Function

Function TransliterateChinese910(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H9100&
	arrChars(i) = "1ruo"
Case &H9101&
	arrChars(i) = "1bei"
Case &H9102&
	arrChars(i) = "1e"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5C14&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H591A&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&
				arrChars(i) = "4E'erduosi"
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5E02&
					arrChars(i) = "5E'erduosi Shi"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5DDE&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Ezhou Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H723E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H591A&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&
				arrChars(i) = "4E'erduosi"
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5E02&
					arrChars(i) = "5E'erduosi Shi"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H9103&
	arrChars(i) = "1shu"
Case &H9104&
	arrChars(i) = "1juan"
Case &H9105&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H9106&
	arrChars(i) = "1yun"
Case &H9107&
	arrChars(i) = "1hou"
Case &H9108&
	arrChars(i) = "1kui"
Case &H9109&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiang"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5BE7&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7E23&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xiangning Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H910A&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiang"
Case &H910B&
	arrChars(i) = "1sou"
Case &H910C&
	arrChars(i) = "1tang"

	arrChars(i) = "1ming"

Function TransliterateChinese91D(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H91D0&
	arrChars(i) = "1li"
Case &H91D1&
	arrChars(i) = "1jin"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H532E&
		arrChars(i) = "2jin gui"
	Case &H53BF&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jin Xian"
	Case &H5C71&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jinshan Xian"
		Case &H7E23&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jinshan Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7E23&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jin Xian"
	Case &H9580&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jinmen"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jinmen Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H95B6&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5340&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jinchang Qu"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H95E8&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jinmen"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jinmen Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H960A&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H533A&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jinchang Qu"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H91D2&
	arrChars(i) = "1jin"
Case &H91D3&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiu"
Case &H91D4&
	arrChars(i) = "1yi"
Case &H91D5&
	arrChars(i) = "1liao"
Case &H91D6&
	arrChars(i) = "1dao"
Case &H91D7&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhao"
Case &H91D8&
	arrChars(i) = "1ding"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H8019&
		arrChars(i) = "2ding pa"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H91D9&
	arrChars(i) = "1po"
Case &H91DA&
	arrChars(i) = "1qiu"

Case &H9242&

Case &H9243&
	arrChars(i) = "1shi"
Case &H9244&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhi"
Case &H9245&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H91CE&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7E23&
			arrChars(i) = "3Juye Xian"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H9246&
	arrChars(i) = "1chan"
Case &H9247&
	arrChars(i) = "1shi"
Case &H9248&
	arrChars(i) = "1shi"
Case &H9249&
	arrChars(i) = "1xuan"

Case &H924F&
	arrChars(i) = "1chu"
End Select
End Function

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5DDE&
		arrChars(i) = "2Jinzhou"

		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jinzhou Shi"

		End If

	arrChars(i) = "1zhuo"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese958(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H9580&
	arrChars(i) = "1men"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H982D&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H6E9D&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5340&
				arrChars(i) = "4Mentougou Qu"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H9581&
	arrChars(i) = "1ma"
Case &H9582&
	arrChars(i) = "1shuan"
Case &H9583&
	arrChars(i) = "1shan"
Case &H9584&
	arrChars(i) = "1huo"
Case &H9585&
	arrChars(i) = "1men"
Case &H9586&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H9587&
	arrChars(i) = "1bi"
Case &H9588&
	arrChars(i) = "1han"
Case &H9589&
	arrChars(i) = "1bi"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H585E&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi se"
	Case &H8457&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi zhe"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H958A&
	arrChars(i) = "1shan"
Case &H958B&
	arrChars(i) = "1kai"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5C01&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Kaifeng Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H62D3&
		arrChars(i) = "2kai tuo"
	Case &H66FC&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7FA4&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H5CF6&
				arrChars(i) = "4Kaiman Qundao"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H79D1&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H65AF&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7FA4&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5CF6&
					arrChars(i) = "5Kaikesi Qundao"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H958C&
	arrChars(i) = "1kang"
Case &H958D&
	arrChars(i) = "1beng"
Case &H958E&
	arrChars(i) = "1hong"
Case &H958F&
	arrChars(i) = "1run"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese973(i As Integer) As String
