Case &H9730&
	arrChars(i) = "1san"
Case &H9731&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H9732&
	arrChars(i) = "1lu"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E11&
		arrChars(i) = "2lou chou"
	Case &H5934&
		arrChars(i) = "2lou tou"
	Case &H5BCC&
		arrChars(i) = "2lou fu"
	Case &H5E95&
		arrChars(i) = "2lou di"
	Case &H602F&
		arrChars(i) = "2lou qie"

	arrChars(i) = "1ling"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E18&

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H7E23&
			arrChars(i) = "3Lingqiu xian"
		End Select

	Case &H9577&

Function TransliterateChinese975(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H9750&
	arrChars(i) = "1bing"
Case &H9751&
	arrChars(i) = "1qing"
Case &H9752&
	arrChars(i) = "1qing"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5C9B&
		arrChars(i) = "2Qingdao"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Qingdao Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5CF6&
		arrChars(i) = "2Qingdao"

		Case &H5E02&

		End Select

			arrChars(i) = "3Qingpu Xian"
		Case &H7E23&
			arrChars(i) = "3Qingpu Xian"
		End Select
		End If

		Case &H7701&

	arrChars(i) = "1jing"

	Case &H4E3D&

		arrChars(i) = "2liang nu&#x0308;"
	Case &H59B9&
		arrChars(i) = "2liang mei"
	End Select
	End If

	arrChars(i) = "1tian"
Case &H9755&

	Case &H6D77&

		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H53BF&
			arrChars(i) = "3Jinghai Xian"
		End Select
		End If

	arrChars(i) = "1jing"

Function TransliterateChinese999(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H9990&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiu"
Case &H9991&
	arrChars(i) = "1jin"
Case &H9992&
	arrChars(i) = "1man"
Case &H9993&
	arrChars(i) = "1san"
Case &H9994&
	arrChars(i) = "1zhuan"
Case &H9995&
	arrChars(i) = "1nang"
Case &H9996&
	arrChars(i) = "1shou"
Case &H9997&
	arrChars(i) = "1kui"
Case &H9998&
	arrChars(i) = "1guo"
Case &H9999&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiang"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4E7E&
		arrChars(i) = "2xiang gan"
	Case &H6A59&
		arrChars(i) = "2xiang cheng"
	Case &H6E2F&
		arrChars(i) = "2Xianggang"
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5E02&
			arrChars(i) = "3Xianggang Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H999A&
	arrChars(i) = "1fen"
Case &H999B&
	arrChars(i) = "1bo"
Case &H999C&
	arrChars(i) = "1ni"
Case &H999D&
	arrChars(i) = "1bi"
Case &H999E&
	arrChars(i) = "1bo"
Case &H999F&
	arrChars(i) = "1tu"
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChinese99A(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H99A0&
	arrChars(i) = "1han"
Case &H99A1&
	arrChars(i) = "1fei"
Case &H99A2&
	arrChars(i) = "1jian"
Case &H99A3&
	arrChars(i) = "1an"
Case &H99A4&
	arrChars(i) = "1ai"
Case &H99A5&
	arrChars(i) = "1fu"
Case &H99A6&
	arrChars(i) = "1xian"
Case &H99A7&
	arrChars(i) = "1yun"
Case &H99A8&
	arrChars(i) = "1xin"
Case &H99A9&
	arrChars(i) = "1fen"
Case &H99AA&
	arrChars(i) = "1pin"
Case &H99AB&
	arrChars(i) = "1xin"
Case &H99AC&
	arrChars(i) = "1ma"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4ED4&
		arrChars(i) = "2ma zai"
	Case &H4F86&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4E9E&
			arrChars(i) = "3Malaiya"
		Case &H897F&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9E&
				arrChars(i) = "4Malaixiya"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5176&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H9813&
			arrChars(i) = "3Maqidun"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5229&
		arrChars(i) = "2Mali"
	Case &H52D2&
		arrChars(i) = "2ma le"
	Case &H5708&
		arrChars(i) = "2ma juan"
	Case &H62C9&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H52A0&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H897F&
				arrChars(i) = "4Malajiaxi"
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H7DAD&
			arrChars(i) = "3Malawei"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H723E&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4ED6&
			arrChars(i) = "3Ma'erta"
		Case &H5730&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H592B&
				arrChars(i) = "4Maerdifu"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7D2E&
		arrChars(i) = "2ma zha"
	Case &H7D39&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H723E&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7FA4&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5CF6&
					arrChars(i) = "5Mashao'erqu&#x0308;ndao"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H9054&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H52A0&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H52A0&
					arrChars(i) = "5Madajiasijia"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H92FC&
		arrChars(i) = "2Magang"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H99AD&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H99AE&
	arrChars(i) = "1Feng"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H6B66&
		arrChars(i) = "2feng wu"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H99AF&
	arrChars(i) = "1han"
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChinese9A6(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &H9A60&
	arrChars(i) = "1yan"
Case &H9A61&
	arrChars(i) = "1long"
Case &H9A62&
	arrChars(i) = "1lu&#x0308;"
Case &H9A63&
	arrChars(i) = "1teng"
Case &H9A64&
	arrChars(i) = "1xiang"
Case &H9A65&
	arrChars(i) = "1ji"
Case &H9A66&
	arrChars(i) = "1shuang"
Case &H9A67&
	arrChars(i) = "1ju"
Case &H9A68&
	arrChars(i) = "1xi"
Case &H9A69&
	arrChars(i) = "1huan"
Case &H9A6A&
	arrChars(i) = "1li"
Case &H9A6B&
	arrChars(i) = "1biao"
Case &H9A6C&
	arrChars(i) = "1ma"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H4ED4&
		arrChars(i) = "2ma zai"
	Case &H5176&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H987F&
			arrChars(i) = "3Maqidun"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H5229&
		arrChars(i) = "2Mali"
	Case &H52D2&
		arrChars(i) = "2ma le"
	Case &H5708&
		arrChars(i) = "2ma juan"
	Case &H5C14&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4ED6&
			arrChars(i) = "3Ma'erta"
		Case &H5730&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H592B&
				arrChars(i) = "4Ma'erdifu"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H62C9&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H52A0&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H897F&
				arrChars(i) = "4Malajiaxi"
			End Select
			End If
		Case &H7EF4&
			arrChars(i) = "3Malawei"
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H6765&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H4E9A&
			arrChars(i) = "3Malaiya"
		Case &H897F&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H4E9A&
				arrChars(i) = "4Malaixiya"
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H7ECD&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H5C14&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H7FA4&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H5C9B&
					arrChars(i) = "5Mashaoerqu&#x0308;nda"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H8FBE&
		If UBound(arrChars) >= i+2 Then
		Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+2))
		Case &H52A0&
			If UBound(arrChars) >= i+3 Then
			Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+3))
			Case &H65AF&
				If UBound(arrChars) >= i+4 Then
				Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+4))
				Case &H52A0&
					arrChars(i) = "5Madajiasijia"
				End Select
				End If
			End Select
			End If
		End Select
		End If
	Case &H94A2&
		arrChars(i) = "2Magang"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H9A6D&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H9A6E&
	arrChars(i) = "1tuo"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H5B50&
		arrChars(i) = "2duo zi"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H9A6F&
	arrChars(i) = "1xun"
End Select
End Function

			arrChars(i) = "3Gaoxiong Shi"
		End Select
		End If
	End Select
	End If
Case &H9AD9&
	arrChars(i) = "1gao"
Case &H9ADA&

	arrChars(i) = "1ling"
Case &H9F85&
	arrChars(i) = "1bao"
Case &H9F86&
	arrChars(i) = "1tiao"
Case &H9F87&
	arrChars(i) = "1zi"
Case &H9F88&
	arrChars(i) = "1ken"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &H708E&
		arrChars(i) = "2yin yan"
	Case &H75C5&
		arrChars(i) = "2yin bing"
	Case &H97F3&
		arrChars(i) = "2yin yin"
	End Select
	End If
Case &H9F89&
	arrChars(i) = "1yu"
Case &H9F8A&
	arrChars(i) = "1chuo"
Case &H9F8B&
	arrChars(i) = "1qu"
Case &H9F8C&
	arrChars(i) = "1wo"
Case &H9F8D&
	arrChars(i) = "1long"
Case &H9F8E&
	arrChars(i) = "1pang"
Case &H9F8F&
	arrChars(i) = "1gong"
End Select
End Function

End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD842(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD842&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2xian"
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2qian"
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhao"
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2can"
	Case &HDC0E&
		arrChars(i) = "2kuo"
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC10&
		arrChars(i) = "2rou"
	Case &HDC14&
		arrChars(i) = "2du"
	Case &HDC17&
		arrChars(i) = "2lie"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2ying"
	Case &HDC1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2du"
	Case &HDC22&
		arrChars(i) = "2ling"
	Case &HDC2A&
		arrChars(i) = "2wan"
	Case &HDC2F&
		arrChars(i) = "2die"
	Case &HDC33&
		arrChars(i) = "2jiu"
	Case &HDC35&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC36&
		arrChars(i) = "2ku"
	Case &HDC37&
		arrChars(i) = "2keng"
	Case &HDC39&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhen"

		arrChars(i) = "2he"
	Case &HDC42&

	Case &HDC44&

		arrChars(i) = "2hang"
	Case &HDC51&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhuo"
	Case &HDC52&
		arrChars(i) = "2dui"
	Case &HDC54&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDC5C&
		arrChars(i) = "2ke"
	Case &HDC5D&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"

Function TransliterateChineseD843(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD843&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDC05&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDC07&
		arrChars(i) = "2jin"
	Case &HDC08&
		arrChars(i) = "2weng"
	Case &HDC09&
		arrChars(i) = "2chao"
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2qiu"
	Case &HDC0D&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhu"
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2zha"
	Case &HDC10&
		arrChars(i) = "2po"
	Case &HDC11&
		arrChars(i) = "2an"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2he"
	Case &HDC15&
		arrChars(i) = "2chu"
	Case &HDC16&
		arrChars(i) = "2yan"
	Case &HDC1A&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2hu"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2e"
	Case &HDC34&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi"
	Case &HDC39&

	Case &HDC3A&

	End If

End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD844(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD844&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC11&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhou"
	Case &HDC14&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu"
	Case &HDC16&
		arrChars(i) = "2bo"
	Case &HDC17&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi"
	Case &HDC18&
		arrChars(i) = "2ying"
	Case &HDC19&
		arrChars(i) = "2ku"
	Case &HDC39&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDC3A&
		arrChars(i) = "2xie"
	Case &HDC3D&
		arrChars(i) = "2ye"
	Case &HDC3E&
		arrChars(i) = "2e"
	Case &HDC3F&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu&#x0308;"
	Case &HDC40&
		arrChars(i) = "2han"
	Case &HDC41&
		arrChars(i) = "2ye"
	Case &HDC46&
		arrChars(i) = "2luo"
	Case &HDC47&
		arrChars(i) = "2chuo"
	Case &HDC48&
		arrChars(i) = "2fan"
	Case &HDC49&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDC4A&
		arrChars(i) = "2ying"
	Case &HDC4B&
		arrChars(i) = "2wen"
	Case &HDC4C&
		arrChars(i) = "2wa"

	Case &HDC55&
		arrChars(i) = "2za"

		arrChars(i) = "2zang"

	End If

End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD845(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD845&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2zao"
	Case &HDC0C&
		arrChars(i) = "2chu"
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2tuo"
	Case &HDC12&
		arrChars(i) = "2hao"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2kang"
	Case &HDC14&
		arrChars(i) = "2yin"
	Case &HDC16&
		arrChars(i) = "2xian"
	Case &HDC1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2fu"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2bie"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2kui"
	Case &HDC24&
		arrChars(i) = "2qie"
	Case &HDC25&
		arrChars(i) = "2sa"
	Case &HDC3F&
		arrChars(i) = "2da"
	Case &HDC40&
		arrChars(i) = "2ye"
	Case &HDC44&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhang"

		arrChars(i) = "2liang"

		arrChars(i) = "2jian"
	Case &HDC76&

Function TransliterateChineseD846(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD846&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC06&

Function TransliterateChineseD847(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD847&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC00&
		arrChars(i) = "2na"
	Case &HDC05&
		arrChars(i) = "2hu"
	Case &HDC06&

	Case &HDFFC&
		arrChars(i) = "2xun"
	Case &HDFFE&
		arrChars(i) = "2ju"
	Case &HDFFF&
		arrChars(i) = "2huo"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD848(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD848&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDC0A&
		arrChars(i) = "2xi"
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2se"
	Case &HDC0C&

		arrChars(i) = "2dan"
	Case &HDFAD&
		arrChars(i) = "2jin"
	Case &HDFB4&

	Case &HDFB5&

		arrChars(i) = "2shen"
	Case &HDFE7&
		arrChars(i) = "2xuan"
	Case &HDFED&
		arrChars(i) = "2liu"
	Case &HDFEE&
		arrChars(i) = "2yuan"
	Case &HDFEF&
		arrChars(i) = "2hu"
	Case &HDFF0&
		arrChars(i) = "2zheng"
	Case &HDFF3&
		arrChars(i) = "2peng"
	Case &HDFF7&
		arrChars(i) = "2jue"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD849(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD849&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC02&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2pian"
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2yuan"
	Case &HDC06&
		arrChars(i) = "2jian"
	Case &HDC0A&

	Case &HDC0E&

	Case &HDC16&

		arrChars(i) = "2qiao"

		arrChars(i) = "2yang"

	Case &HDFEF&

	Case &HDFF0&
		arrChars(i) = "2ai"
	Case &HDFF1&

	Case &HDFF3&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu&#x0308;"
	Case &HDFF4&
		arrChars(i) = "2tui"
	Case &HDFF5&

	Case &HDFFE&
		arrChars(i) = "2hui"
	Case &HDFFF&
		arrChars(i) = "2huan"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD84C(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD84C&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC00&
		arrChars(i) = "2lei"
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhan"
	Case &HDC02&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2lian"
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2qun"
	Case &HDC0D&
		arrChars(i) = "2chen"
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2cheng"
	Case &HDC10&
		arrChars(i) = "2gu"
	Case &HDC12&
		arrChars(i) = "2zong"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2chou"
	Case &HDC14&
		arrChars(i) = "2chuan"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2lei"
	Case &HDC1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2shuo"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu&#x0308;"
	Case &HDC23&
		arrChars(i) = "2fu"
	Case &HDC25&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC27&
		arrChars(i) = "2san"
	Case &HDC2B&
		arrChars(i) = "2san"
	Case &HDC2F&
		arrChars(i) = "2sa"
	Case &HDC33&
		arrChars(i) = "2nie"
	Case &HDC36&
		arrChars(i) = "2zuan"
	Case &HDC37&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC3B&
		arrChars(i) = "2shu"
	Case &HDC3E&
		arrChars(i) = "2fu"
	Case &HDC49&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi"
	Case &HDC4D&
		arrChars(i) = "2dao"
	Case &HDC52&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi"
	Case &HDC56&
		arrChars(i) = "2gan"
	Case &HDC57&
		arrChars(i) = "2tan"
	Case &HDC5C&

	End If

End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD84D(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD84D&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC02&
		arrChars(i) = "2ye"
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2chi"
	Case &HDC0A&
		arrChars(i) = "2kao"
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2yue"
	Case &HDC0E&
		arrChars(i) = "2wa"
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2nian"
	Case &HDC11&
		arrChars(i) = "2ci"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDC24&
		arrChars(i) = "2jiu"
	Case &HDC2B&
		arrChars(i) = "2yang"
	Case &HDC2C&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC2E&
		arrChars(i) = "2dai"
	Case &HDC2F&
		arrChars(i) = "2chong"
	Case &HDC35&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDC3A&
		arrChars(i) = "2han"
	Case &HDC3F&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDC41&
		arrChars(i) = "2chong"
	Case &HDC42&
		arrChars(i) = "2hu"

		arrChars(i) = "2lao"

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD84E(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD84E&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC0E&
		arrChars(i) = "2xiao"
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2zou"
	Case &HDC1A&
		arrChars(i) = "2liu"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhao"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhe"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2lei"
	Case &HDC2D&

	Case &HDC37&
		arrChars(i) = "2jian"
	Case &HDC38&
		arrChars(i) = "2shuan"
	Case &HDC39&
		arrChars(i) = "2zuo"
	Case &HDC3A&
		arrChars(i) = "2qie"
	Case &HDC3C&
		arrChars(i) = "2lao"
	Case &HDC49&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu"
	Case &HDC4A&

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD84F(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD84F&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2xu"
	Case &HDC07&
		arrChars(i) = "2rong"
	Case &HDC08&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji"
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2qu"
	Case &HDC0C&
		arrChars(i) = "2lie"
	Case &HDC15&
		arrChars(i) = "2sao"
	Case &HDC18&
		arrChars(i) = "2kun"
	Case &HDC1A&
		arrChars(i) = "2cui"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2ye"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2bing"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2jie"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2qu"
	Case &HDC21&
		arrChars(i) = "2qu"
	Case &HDC25&
		arrChars(i) = "2meng"
	Case &HDC26&
		arrChars(i) = "2ran"
	Case &HDC28&

Function TransliterateChineseD850(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD850&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2hao"
	Case &HDC09&

Function TransliterateChineseD851(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD851&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC00&
		arrChars(i) = "2hu"
	Case &HDC14&

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD852(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD852&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC00&
		arrChars(i) = "2za"
	Case &HDC07&
		arrChars(i) = "2ge"
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2lou"
	Case &HDC0C&
		arrChars(i) = "2chai"
	Case &HDC0D&
		arrChars(i) = "2pan"
	Case &HDC0E&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji"
	Case &HDC10&
		arrChars(i) = "2ta"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2xi"
	Case &HDC16&
		arrChars(i) = "2xiao"
	Case &HDC18&
		arrChars(i) = "2sao"
	Case &HDC19&
		arrChars(i) = "2jia"
	Case &HDC1A&
		arrChars(i) = "2su"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2huang"
	Case &HDC1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2cuo"
	Case &HDC1F&
		arrChars(i) = "2ta"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2shuai"
	Case &HDC2A&
		arrChars(i) = "2fu"
	Case &HDC2B&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC2D&
		arrChars(i) = "2she"
	Case &HDC2F&
		arrChars(i) = "2tang"
	Case &HDC36&
		arrChars(i) = "2dian"
	Case &HDC3A&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi"
	Case &HDC3C&
		arrChars(i) = "2gou"
	Case &HDC3D&
		arrChars(i) = "2cu"
	Case &HDC3F&
		arrChars(i) = "2qian"
	Case &HDC42&
		arrChars(i) = "2lei"
	Case &HDC43&
		arrChars(i) = "2su"
	Case &HDC46&
		arrChars(i) = "2zong"
	Case &HDC47&
		arrChars(i) = "2hao"
	Case &HDC4F&
		arrChars(i) = "2chi"
	Case &HDC50&
		arrChars(i) = "2cao"
	Case &HDC53&
		arrChars(i) = "2wo"
	Case &HDC54&
		arrChars(i) = "2xiao"
	Case &HDC55&
		arrChars(i) = "2lie"
	Case &HDC56&
		arrChars(i) = "2yan"
	Case &HDC5D&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi"
	Case &HDC5F&
		arrChars(i) = "2huan"
	Case &HDC61&
		arrChars(i) = "2xi"
	Case &HDC62&
		arrChars(i) = "2chi"
	Case &HDC63&
		arrChars(i) = "2xu"
	Case &HDC64&
		arrChars(i) = "2nao"
	Case &HDC65&
		arrChars(i) = "2yan"
	Case &HDC67&
		arrChars(i) = "2xie"
	Case &HDC68&

	End If

End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD853(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD853&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC02&
		arrChars(i) = "2rang"
	Case &HDC05&
		arrChars(i) = "2xiang"
	Case &HDC08&
		arrChars(i) = "2bei"
	Case &HDC0C&
		arrChars(i) = "2chuan"
	Case &HDC11&
		arrChars(i) = "2pu"
	Case &HDC19&
		arrChars(i) = "2ge"
	Case &HDC1A&
		arrChars(i) = "2la"
	Case &HDC1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2quan"
	Case &HDC1F&
		arrChars(i) = "2hang"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2chi"
	Case &HDC21&
		arrChars(i) = "2mang"
	Case &HDC26&
		arrChars(i) = "2zha"
	Case &HDC2A&
		arrChars(i) = "2fen"
	Case &HDC2C&
		arrChars(i) = "2chao"
	Case &HDC33&
		arrChars(i) = "2jing"
	Case &HDC43&
		arrChars(i) = "2lie"
	Case &HDC45&
		arrChars(i) = "2na"
	Case &HDC46&
		arrChars(i) = "2na"
	Case &HDC47&
		arrChars(i) = "2tong"
	Case &HDC4B&
		arrChars(i) = "2ran"
	Case &HDC4C&
		arrChars(i) = "2zu"
	Case &HDC4D&
		arrChars(i) = "2pi"
	Case &HDC4E&
		arrChars(i) = "2you"
	Case &HDC50&
		arrChars(i) = "2shu"
	Case &HDC5B&
		arrChars(i) = "2lie"
	Case &HDC5C&
		arrChars(i) = "2shou"
	Case &HDC5D&
		arrChars(i) = "2tuan"
	Case &HDC5F&
		arrChars(i) = "2gao"
	Case &HDC60&
		arrChars(i) = "2shao"

Function TransliterateChineseD854(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD854&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2du"
	Case &HDC02&
		arrChars(i) = "2beng"
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2hou"
	Case &HDC08&
		arrChars(i) = "2zha"
	Case &HDC09&
		arrChars(i) = "2zha"
	Case &HDC0E&
		arrChars(i) = "2que"
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2ma"
	Case &HDC10&
		arrChars(i) = "2han"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2liu"
	Case &HDC14&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu"
	Case &HDC16&
		arrChars(i) = "2zi"
	Case &HDC18&
		arrChars(i) = "2pi"
	Case &HDC19&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhou"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2zao"
	Case &HDC1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2niu"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2hui"
	Case &HDC23&
		arrChars(i) = "2xue"
	Case &HDC25&
		arrChars(i) = "2la"
	Case &HDC2B&
		arrChars(i) = "2nou"
	Case &HDC2C&
		arrChars(i) = "2yan"
	Case &HDC2D&
		arrChars(i) = "2ran"
	Case &HDC2E&
		arrChars(i) = "2nao"
	Case &HDC30&
		arrChars(i) = "2la"
	Case &HDC31&
		arrChars(i) = "2guang"
	Case &HDC32&
		arrChars(i) = "2du"
	Case &HDC35&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu"
	Case &HDC39&
		arrChars(i) = "2jian"
	Case &HDC3A&
		arrChars(i) = "2xie"
	Case &HDC3B&
		arrChars(i) = "2qi"
	Case &HDC3E&
		arrChars(i) = "2xiang"
	Case &HDC41&
		arrChars(i) = "2guo"
	Case &HDC42&
		arrChars(i) = "2jie"
	Case &HDC43&
		arrChars(i) = "2mang"
	Case &HDC46&
		arrChars(i) = "2xia"
	Case &HDC47&
		arrChars(i) = "2kui"
	Case &HDC4E&
		arrChars(i) = "2yong"
	Case &HDC50&
		arrChars(i) = "2hai"
	Case &HDC51&
		arrChars(i) = "2mi"
	Case &HDC52&
		arrChars(i) = "2yao"
	Case &HDC55&
		arrChars(i) = "2wen"
	Case &HDC5F&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC60&
		arrChars(i) = "2juan"
	Case &HDC61&
		arrChars(i) = "2wu"
	Case &HDC62&
		arrChars(i) = "2qiao"
	Case &HDC6E&
		arrChars(i) = "2diao"
	Case &HDC6F&
		arrChars(i) = "2chu"
	Case &HDC72&

	Case &HDC75&

	Case &HDC78&
		arrChars(i) = "2quan"
	Case &HDC79&

	Case &HDC81&
		arrChars(i) = "2yan"
	Case &HDC82&
		arrChars(i) = "2meng"
	Case &HDC83&
		arrChars(i) = "2ju"
	Case &HDC8B&
		arrChars(i) = "2tu"
	Case &HDC92&
		arrChars(i) = "2nong"
	Case &HDC93&

	Case &HDFC4&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDFC5&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDFC7&
		arrChars(i) = "2huan"
	Case &HDFC8&
		arrChars(i) = "2chou"
	Case &HDFCA&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDFCE&
		arrChars(i) = "2ying"
	Case &HDFD2&
		arrChars(i) = "2wu"
	Case &HDFD3&
		arrChars(i) = "2bei"
	Case &HDFD5&
		arrChars(i) = "2hong"
	Case &HDFD6&
		arrChars(i) = "2shen"
	Case &HDFD8&
		arrChars(i) = "2jue"
	Case &HDFD9&
		arrChars(i) = "2kui"
	Case &HDFDC&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDFDD&
		arrChars(i) = "2ya"
	Case &HDFE0&

	Case &HDFE4&
		arrChars(i) = "2kua"
	Case &HDFE5&
		arrChars(i) = "2qian"
	Case &HDFE8&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhao"
	Case &HDFEA&
		arrChars(i) = "2kai"
	Case &HDFEB&
		arrChars(i) = "2shang"
	Case &HDFEE&
		arrChars(i) = "2an"
	Case &HDFEF&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhe"
	Case &HDFF0&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDFF7&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDFF9&
		arrChars(i) = "2jiao"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD855(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD855&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC00&
		arrChars(i) = "2si"
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2pu"
	Case &HDC02&
		arrChars(i) = "2ou"
	Case &HDC0A&

	Case &HDC1F&

	Case &HDC29&

	Case &HDC2C&
		arrChars(i) = "2gu"

		arrChars(i) = "2wan"
	Case &HDFFD&
		arrChars(i) = "2wu"
	Case &HDFFE&
		arrChars(i) = "2ku"
	Case &HDFFF&
		arrChars(i) = "2wo"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD856(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD856&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC00&
		arrChars(i) = "2xing"
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2ke"
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2jiu"
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2duan"
	Case &HDC05&
		arrChars(i) = "2huan"
	Case &HDC08&

	Case &HDC09&

	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji"
	Case &HDC0D&
		arrChars(i) = "2ye"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2jing"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2yang"
	Case &HDC21&
		arrChars(i) = "2zong"
	Case &HDC29&
		arrChars(i) = "2can"
	Case &HDC31&

		arrChars(i) = "2wei"
	Case &HDFE5&
		arrChars(i) = "2che"
	Case &HDFE6&
		arrChars(i) = "2jian"
	Case &HDFE8&
		arrChars(i) = "2si"
	Case &HDFE9&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhuo"
	Case &HDFEA&
		arrChars(i) = "2sou"
	Case &HDFEC&
		arrChars(i) = "2ruan"
	Case &HDFEE&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu"
	Case &HDFF3&
		arrChars(i) = "2e"
	Case &HDFF6&
		arrChars(i) = "2ku"
	Case &HDFF8&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhu"
	Case &HDFFE&
		arrChars(i) = "2xia"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD857(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD857&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2fu"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2tao"
	Case &HDC1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2xi"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2chou"
	Case &HDC1F&
		arrChars(i) = "2yuan"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu&#x0308;"
	Case &HDC21&
		arrChars(i) = "2ce"
	Case &HDC22&
		arrChars(i) = "2shan"
	Case &HDC23&
		arrChars(i) = "2liu"
	Case &HDC25&
		arrChars(i) = "2xi"
	Case &HDC26&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji"
	Case &HDC27&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDC28&
		arrChars(i) = "2tan"
	Case &HDC2A&
		arrChars(i) = "2hu"
	Case &HDC2D&

	Case &HDC2E&

	Case &HDC32&

	Case &HDFFA&
		arrChars(i) = "2gou"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD858(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD858&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC07&
		arrChars(i) = "2jing"
	Case &HDC13&

		arrChars(i) = "2hong"
	Case &HDFFB&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu"
	Case &HDFFF&
		arrChars(i) = "2chi"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD859(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD859&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2chi"
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2hang"

		arrChars(i) = "2ju"

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD85A(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD85A&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2cu"
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji"
	Case &HDC05&
		arrChars(i) = "2xun"
	Case &HDC06&
		arrChars(i) = "2sun"
	Case &HDC07&

	Case &HDC09&

	Case &HDC0E&

	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC16&
		arrChars(i) = "2pao"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2za"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2ye"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi"
	Case &HDC1F&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhe"
	Case &HDC20&

	Case &HDC23&

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD85B(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD85B&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2diao"
	Case &HDC16&
		arrChars(i) = "2wo"
	Case &HDC18&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDC19&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2fen"
	Case &HDC21&
		arrChars(i) = "2na"
	Case &HDC25&
		arrChars(i) = "2bang"
	Case &HDC2A&
		arrChars(i) = "2qiu"
	Case &HDC2B&
		arrChars(i) = "2ni"
	Case &HDC2C&
		arrChars(i) = "2bo"
	Case &HDC2D&
		arrChars(i) = "2dun"
	Case &HDC2F&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi"
	Case &HDC30&
		arrChars(i) = "2xu"
	Case &HDC31&
		arrChars(i) = "2chang"
	Case &HDC32&
		arrChars(i) = "2xu"

		arrChars(i) = "2xin"

	Case &HDFD3&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji"
	Case &HDFD6&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD85C(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD85C&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2chang"
	Case &HDC05&
		arrChars(i) = "2mie"
	Case &HDC06&
		arrChars(i) = "2meng"
	Case &HDC07&
		arrChars(i) = "2jian"
	Case &HDC0A&
		arrChars(i) = "2cai"
	Case &HDC0C&
		arrChars(i) = "2su"
	Case &HDC14&
		arrChars(i) = "2he"
	Case &HDC15&
		arrChars(i) = "2sa"
	Case &HDC17&
		arrChars(i) = "2zi"
	Case &HDC18&
		arrChars(i) = "2keng"
	Case &HDC19&
		arrChars(i) = "2geng"
	Case &HDC1A&
		arrChars(i) = "2si"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2ti"
	Case &HDC21&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhan"
	Case &HDC22&
		arrChars(i) = "2xie"
	Case &HDC23&

	Case &HDC24&

		arrChars(i) = "2you"
	Case &HDC26&

	Case &HDC27&

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD85D(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD85D&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2su"
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2xie"
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu"
	Case &HDC05&
		arrChars(i) = "2qu"
	Case &HDC08&
		arrChars(i) = "2zu"
	Case &HDC09&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDC0A&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhang"
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2lue"
	Case &HDC0C&
		arrChars(i) = "2wei"
	Case &HDC0D&
		arrChars(i) = "2chong"
	Case &HDC0E&
		arrChars(i) = "2mi"
	Case &HDC10&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji"
	Case &HDC12&
		arrChars(i) = "2su"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2ye"

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD85E(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD85E&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC02&
		arrChars(i) = "2ku"
	Case &HDC06&
		arrChars(i) = "2wan"
	Case &HDC08&
		arrChars(i) = "2cha"
	Case &HDC0A&
		arrChars(i) = "2mao"
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2ke"
	Case &HDC0E&
		arrChars(i) = "2ci"
	Case &HDC12&
		arrChars(i) = "2xian"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2mo"
	Case &HDC1A&
		arrChars(i) = "2hun"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2chan"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi"
	Case &HDC1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhen"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2e"
	Case &HDC1F&
		arrChars(i) = "2mi"
	Case &HDC21&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi"
	Case &HDC22&
		arrChars(i) = "2qu"
	Case &HDC23&
		arrChars(i) = "2shu"
	Case &HDC25&
		arrChars(i) = "2ci"
	Case &HDC26&
		arrChars(i) = "2yan"

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD85F(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD85F&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2lou"
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2tuan"
	Case &HDC07&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu"
	Case &HDC08&
		arrChars(i) = "2wu"
	Case &HDC0A&
		arrChars(i) = "2tian"
	Case &HDC12&
		arrChars(i) = "2guo"
	Case &HDC18&
		arrChars(i) = "2tan"
	Case &HDC19&
		arrChars(i) = "2qi"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2lie"
	Case &HDC21&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDC23&
		arrChars(i) = "2xun"
	Case &HDC28&
		arrChars(i) = "2geng"
	Case &HDC29&
		arrChars(i) = "2ting"
	Case &HDC2A&
		arrChars(i) = "2han"
	Case &HDC2B&
		arrChars(i) = "2chu"
	Case &HDC2D&
		arrChars(i) = "2tun"
	Case &HDC2F&
		arrChars(i) = "2xiong"
	Case &HDC30&
		arrChars(i) = "2you"
	Case &HDC31&
		arrChars(i) = "2mo"
	Case &HDC32&
		arrChars(i) = "2chi"
	Case &HDC34&
		arrChars(i) = "2hu"
	Case &HDC35&
		arrChars(i) = "2du"
	Case &HDC37&

	Case &HDC39&
		arrChars(i) = "2na"

		arrChars(i) = "2ling"
	Case &HDC3F&
		arrChars(i) = "2ai"
	Case &HDC40&

	Case &HDC44&

	Case &HDFFC&
		arrChars(i) = "2gua"
	Case &HDFFD&
		arrChars(i) = "2po"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD860(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD860&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC00&
		arrChars(i) = "2ni"
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2long"
	Case &HDC04&
		arrChars(i) = "2wa"
	Case &HDC05&
		arrChars(i) = "2yan"
	Case &HDC14&
		arrChars(i) = "2chou"
	Case &HDC15&
		arrChars(i) = "2kuang"
	Case &HDC16&
		arrChars(i) = "2hai"
	Case &HDC18&
		arrChars(i) = "2xiang"
	Case &HDC19&
		arrChars(i) = "2xi"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2cun"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2tong"
	Case &HDC1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2ruo"
	Case &HDC1F&

	Case &HDFFF&

	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD861(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD861&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2die"
	Case &HDC03&

Function TransliterateChineseD862(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD862&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2gu"
	Case &HDC0C&
		arrChars(i) = "2tong"
	Case &HDC0E&
		arrChars(i) = "2ling"
	Case &HDC0F&

End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD863(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD863&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC02&
		arrChars(i) = "2qian"
	Case &HDC06&
		arrChars(i) = "2chuo"
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2ta"
	Case &HDC11&
		arrChars(i) = "2diao"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2jian"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDC1C&

	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2mo"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2luo"
	Case &HDC26&
		arrChars(i) = "2bao"
	Case &HDC2D&
		arrChars(i) = "2zuan"
	Case &HDC35&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhe"
	Case &HDC38&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu"
	Case &HDC3B&
		arrChars(i) = "2bao"
	Case &HDC3E&
		arrChars(i) = "2ma"
	Case &HDC3F&
		arrChars(i) = "2xi"
	Case &HDC40&

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD864(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD864&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2run"
	Case &HDC16&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2diao"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2cang"

		arrChars(i) = "2wei"
	Case &HDC3C&
		arrChars(i) = "2san"

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD865(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD865&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC00&
		arrChars(i) = "2xia"
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2xie"
	Case &HDC05&
		arrChars(i) = "2sa"
	Case &HDC06&
		arrChars(i) = "2ji"
	Case &HDC09&
		arrChars(i) = "2xie"
	Case &HDC0C&
		arrChars(i) = "2dui"
	Case &HDC0D&
		arrChars(i) = "2zi"
	Case &HDC18&
		arrChars(i) = "2yuan"
	Case &HDC19&
		arrChars(i) = "2qin"
	Case &HDC1A&
		arrChars(i) = "2fu"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2peng"
	Case &HDC1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2pao"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2yin"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2hong"
	Case &HDC21&
		arrChars(i) = "2zu"
	Case &HDC23&
		arrChars(i) = "2gong"
	Case &HDC24&
		arrChars(i) = "2dong"
	Case &HDC25&
		arrChars(i) = "2he"
	Case &HDC26&
		arrChars(i) = "2wo"
	Case &HDC28&
		arrChars(i) = "2pang"
	Case &HDC2B&
		arrChars(i) = "2su"
	Case &HDC2C&
		arrChars(i) = "2kan"
	Case &HDC2D&
		arrChars(i) = "2nie"
	Case &HDC2E&
		arrChars(i) = "2hao"
	Case &HDC2F&
		arrChars(i) = "2feng"
	Case &HDC30&
		arrChars(i) = "2e"
	Case &HDC31&
		arrChars(i) = "2ye"
	Case &HDC34&
		arrChars(i) = "2ting"
	Case &HDC35&
		arrChars(i) = "2dong"

	Case &HDCD3&

		arrChars(i) = "2yu"
	Case &HDFF6&
		arrChars(i) = "2chan"
	Case &HDFF7&
		arrChars(i) = "2yong"
	Case &HDFF8&
		arrChars(i) = "2huo"
	Case &HDFFA&
		arrChars(i) = "2lan"
	Case &HDFFF&
		arrChars(i) = "2na"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD866(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD866&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC00&
		arrChars(i) = "2ba"
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2gan"
	Case &HDC02&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2jia"
	Case &HDC05&
		arrChars(i) = "2da"
	Case &HDC06&
		arrChars(i) = "2ding"
	Case &HDC07&
		arrChars(i) = "2xun"
	Case &HDC08&

	Case &HDC09&
		arrChars(i) = "2juan"
	Case &HDC0A&
		arrChars(i) = "2tuan"
	Case &HDC0B&
		arrChars(i) = "2xu"
	Case &HDC0C&
		arrChars(i) = "2song"
	Case &HDC0E&
		arrChars(i) = "2cao"
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2cheng"
	Case &HDC11&

	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD867(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD867&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC00&
		arrChars(i) = "2chong"
	Case &HDC03&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhan"
	Case &HDC0D&
		arrChars(i) = "2bian"
	Case &HDC0E&
		arrChars(i) = "2weng"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2hong"
	Case &HDC17&
		arrChars(i) = "2pin"
	Case &HDC19&
		arrChars(i) = "2se"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2ni"
	Case &HDC1F&
		arrChars(i) = "2fen"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2xu"
	Case &HDC22&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi"
	Case &HDC24&
		arrChars(i) = "2ju"
	Case &HDC28&
		arrChars(i) = "2jue"
	Case &HDC2A&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu"
	Case &HDC2C&
		arrChars(i) = "2guo"
	Case &HDC2D&
		arrChars(i) = "2guo"
	Case &HDC2F&
		arrChars(i) = "2hu"
	Case &HDC32&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"

End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD868(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD868&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC01&
		arrChars(i) = "2ge"
	Case &HDC09&
		arrChars(i) = "2ge"
	Case &HDC0A&
		arrChars(i) = "2qu"
	Case &HDC0F&
		arrChars(i) = "2ju"
	Case &HDC12&
		arrChars(i) = "2die"
	Case &HDC13&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDC14&
		arrChars(i) = "2shi"
	Case &HDC15&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDC17&
		arrChars(i) = "2gui"
	Case &HDC18&
		arrChars(i) = "2jiang"
	Case &HDC1A&
		arrChars(i) = "2song"
	Case &HDC1B&
		arrChars(i) = "2qiong"
	Case &HDC1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2e"
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2huang"
	Case &HDC1F&
		arrChars(i) = "2hui"
	Case &HDC20&
		arrChars(i) = "2xun"
	Case &HDC23&
		arrChars(i) = "2ju"
	Case &HDC25&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhai"
	Case &HDC26&
		arrChars(i) = "2chi"

	Case &HDFFC&
		arrChars(i) = "2li"
	Case &HDFFF&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhu"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

Function TransliterateChineseD86A(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD86A&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC33&

End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD875(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD875&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDD46&
		arrChars(i) = "2suo"
	Case &HDE13&
		arrChars(i) = "2hu"
	Case &HDEA6&
		arrChars(i) = "2guo"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD876(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD876&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDCC7&
		arrChars(i) = "2dian"
	Case &HDD30&
		arrChars(i) = "2yu"
	Case &HDE86&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhua"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC4A&
		arrChars(i) = "2hong"

		arrChars(i) = "2luo"

	End If

End Function

Case &HD878&
	arrChars(i) = "1"

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDD8F&
		arrChars(i) = "2lan"

		arrChars(i) = "2lu"
	Case &HDE62&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhi"
	Case &HDE64&
		arrChars(i) = "2gua"
	Case &HDE67&
		arrChars(i) = "2liang"
	Case &HDE68&
		arrChars(i) = "2gua"
	Case &HDE6A&
		arrChars(i) = "2zou"
	Case &HDE6B&
		arrChars(i) = "2rui"
	Case &HDE6C&
		arrChars(i) = "2cui"
	Case &HDE6F&
		arrChars(i) = "2cai"

	End If
End Select
End Function

	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC28&
		arrChars(i) = "2ying"
	Case &HDD02&
		arrChars(i) = "2jie"
	Case &HDD05&
		arrChars(i) = "2fu"
	Case &HDD0A&
		arrChars(i) = "2liang"
	Case &HDD81&
		arrChars(i) = "2liang"
	Case &HDDB1&
		arrChars(i) = "2xie"
	Case &HDE4A&
		arrChars(i) = "2yin"
	Case &HDE4B&
		arrChars(i) = "2du"
	Case &HDF74&
		arrChars(i) = "2gu"
	Case &HDF75&
		arrChars(i) = "2er"
	Case &HDF78&
		arrChars(i) = "2chun"
	Case &HDF79&
		arrChars(i) = "2huan"
	Case &HDF7A&
		arrChars(i) = "2ge"

End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD87A(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD87A&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2qiang"
	Case &HDCF2&
		arrChars(i) = "2gang"
	Case &HDCF3&
		arrChars(i) = "2hong"
	Case &HDCF4&
		arrChars(i) = "2chan"
	Case &HDCF5&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhui"
	Case &HDCF6&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu&#x0308;"
	Case &HDCF7&
		arrChars(i) = "2ju"
	Case &HDD32&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi"
	Case &HDDF4&
		arrChars(i) = "2chang"
	Case &HDDF5&
		arrChars(i) = "2wei"
	Case &HDE5B&
		arrChars(i) = "2bi"
	Case &HDEA3&
		arrChars(i) = "2zong"
	Case &HDEA5&
		arrChars(i) = "2dun"
	Case &HDEC2&
		arrChars(i) = "2ning"
	Case &HDF1C&
		arrChars(i) = "2yi"
	Case &HDF1D&
		arrChars(i) = "2gui"
	Case &HDF1E&
		arrChars(i) = "2can"
	Case &HDF1F&
		arrChars(i) = "2huo"
	Case &HDF20&
		arrChars(i) = "2lu"
	Case &HDF21&
		arrChars(i) = "2hua"
	Case &HDF22&
		arrChars(i) = "2weng"
	Case &HDF23&
		arrChars(i) = "2xian"
	Case &HDF24&
		arrChars(i) = "2zhen"
	Case &HDF65&
		arrChars(i) = "2gong"
	Case &HDF66&
		arrChars(i) = "2chen"
	Case &HDF68&
		arrChars(i) = "2yan"
	Case &HDF6A&
		arrChars(i) = "2shuang"
	Case &HDF70&
		arrChars(i) = "2gang"
	Case &HDFD9&
		arrChars(i) = "2ke"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
Function TransliterateChineseD87E(i As Integer) As String
Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i))
Case &HD87E&
	arrChars(i) = "1"
	If UBound(arrChars) >= i+1 Then
	Select Case GetHexCode(arrChars(i+1))
	Case &HDC35&
		arrChars(i) = "2hui"
	End Select
	End If
End Select
End Function
